201072.text: What? Are you afraid... Or just cautious?

201073.text: I won't hurt you. I am Fellagood from the Holy Church, a preacher who serves the merciful God.

201074.text: Oh, I heard that some wicked ones are searching for the Sacred Relic here.

201075.text: They intend to awaken the demon in slumber, which will bring untold suffering to this world.

201076.text: As a follower of the merciful God, I'm so worried and eager to smash the scheme of the wicked ones as soon as possible.

201077.text: Oh, so you must have met those sneaky fiends. They're good at worming their way into people's trust to their own nefarious ends.

201078.text: Their target is to grab the Sacred Relic in the tower to revive the demon.

201081.text: It's carved with an oracle, a trial given to us by the merciful God.

201082.text: Only by passing the trial can we find the Sacred Relic and foil the fiends' plot once and for all.

201083.text: If you see one of these steles, please keep me informed.

201084.text: Your good deeds will be favored by God.

201085.text: Uh, I have to find the other steles before those treacherous ones get ahead of me.

201086.text: You should be cautious too. Don't be fooled by them.

201087.text: Here we meet again. You look worried.

201088.text: So, the statements from the preacher of the Holy Church and the ones from the nobles do not match up...

201089.text: There is nothing that exists in absolute.

201090.text: Within kindness there's evil, and within evil there's kindness. Darkness may hide deep inside light, and in the heart of darkness lies light.

201091.text: Life, life, life, life; life is death. Death, death, death, death; death is life.

201092.text: Meow, It's up to how you comprehend it. All behaviors and words embed purposes.

201093.text: Meow? Even you believe that is the treasure?

201094.text: So troublesome. Meow is going back to sleep...

201095.text: The Hall of Reversal is right above us. That's where the Endpoint of the Intangible Radius is.

201096.text: Meow, I saw some other humans passing through. You should be careful. Don't trust others too easily.

201097.text: I'm going back to sleep. Goodbye...

201098.text: Heretic, you wish to renew the Demon Force?

201099.text: That's very dangerous. As the preacher of the Holy Church, I cannot allow that to happen!

201100.text: Humph, the Holy Church also gets involved? You just want to keep the Dark Magic for yourselves, don't you!

201101.text: We are the followers of the merciful god. Anything we do is instructed by the revelation of god.

201102.text: Stupid fool, don't get in the way of my research.

201103.text: Urgh, that wicked magic is so powerful!

201104.text: It's you. You are still here?

201105.text: You ignorant fool, how dare you talk to me like that.

201106.text: Huh? How naive. You think those chaps from the Holy Church are well-intentioned?

201107.text: Don't expect me to thank you. I never asked you to save me.

201108.text: Ignorance is also a sin. You can die here along with this hypocritical preacher!

201110.text: I have already mastered the Dark Magic! How come I...

201112.text: I haven't done enough research. It seems like I'll have to...

201113.text: I have failed this time. Wicked preacher, you get to keep your life for now.

201114.text: As a talented alchemist, I shall keep this humiliation in mind and get my revenge later.

201115.text: Lord Fellagood, you've been severely hurt. You need to be treated right away.

201116.text: Ah, be careful out there... Cough...

201117.text: Don't go too far, and once you have more information, do notify me!

201118.text: May the merciful god bless you.

201119.text: So, as you have seen, Snegurochka is collapsing, not far away from its destruction.

201120.text: Yes, all the choices finally lead to the collapse of Snegurochka.

201121.text: Don't blame yourself, because you know little about this world.

201122.text: The destruction of Snegurochka is the inevitable end of the Intangible.

201123.text: Fate will not change even if you fail to defeat Cersivey.

201124.text: But since your ability of Intangible Shifting has awoken, it may be possible for you to rewrite fate.

201125.text: I can help you to channel your Time Shifting magic, which will allow you to go back to a previous point in time.

201126.text: That way, you can understand Snegurochka better, and maybe find a way to save it.

201128.text: You can resonate with me by using the power hidden inside, and gain a little insight into what's going to happen on that day.

201129.text: Although, on how to interpret the patterns that appear, you may just listen to your heart.

201130.text: To restore your memory, go find all the shards.

201131.text: Master, have you forgotten who you are?

201132.text: They also cooperate with those corrupted nobles to amass power from the mortal world.

201133.text: Have you found a way out of this tower?

201134.text: My employer is in the tower and stuck too. Both of us are looking for a way out of this tower.

201135.text: Unlike me, she's noble and civilized. You two will surely become good friends if you ever get a chance to meet with each other.

201136.text: Anyway, be careful of those from the Holy Church. More than likely, they are also here for the treasure.

201137.text: Anyway, be careful of those from the Holy Church. More than likely, they are also here for the treasure.

201139.text: You still carry the great responsibility of bringing back your family's glory days. Do you want to die here?

201140.text: Don't worry. I won't die before I've learned the lost magic.

201141.text: After I get out of this, I'll find you at the tower bottom.

201144.text: Young lady, you are impressive. Bit by bit, I'll let you be my captive.

201147.text: It seems like you crave to dive into the abyss of the forbidden arts just as I do.

201148.text: You will join us one day. Before that, just keep struggling...

201151.text: This is Snegurochka, but not the same chronospace that you were in before.

201152.text: After the Intangible Shifting, you have returned to a time in the past.

201153.text: Can you see the magic boundary over there?

201154.text: That was set by Cersivey to stop others from entering. You are inside the boundary because of the disturbance of chronospace.

201155.text: The mystery of this world is hidden right here, which is the answer you are looking for.

201158.text: You should believe what I've said by now. After the Intangible Shifting, you have returned to a time in the past.

201159.text: But no one can predict what's going to happen next since the chronospace itself has changed.

201160.text: I don't know it, either. But I hope you can find the answers to all your questions this time.

201161.text: I have said too much. I'm tired and I'm going back to sleep now.

201162.text: The geothermal surge is really troublesome.

201163.text: Her Saintess asked me to seal all the crevices, but it's so hard!

201164.text: Geothermal activities have become increasingly frequent. Uh, so much trouble. I'm so tired.

201165.text: Hervoraltar, are you slacking off again?

201166.text: Oh, Your Saintess, when have I ever slacked off?

201167.text: You must know what a laborious job it is to seal all these crevices one by one.

201169.text: Please don't be unhappy, Your Saintess.

201170.text: I will stop whining. The cracks here are all sealed. Let's head to the next spot now!

201171.text: Hervoraltar, the Geothermy is getting more and more active.

201172.text: I can sense that it will bring great disasters to my beloved Snegurochka.

201173.text: It has been over two hundred years since the last time geothermal activity was this frequent.

201174.text: My honorable Saintess, don't worry. You have not only me, but also your followers from the Chivalric Order to share your burden.

201175.text: Let's head to the next spot now.

201177.text: I know everyone from the village, and you don't look familiar at all. You are not from the village, are you?

201178.text: Walking in this blizzard is way too dangerous.

201179.text: I can take you to the village by the foothills. People would love to help you even if you're not a villager.

201180.text: The White Bear? How did you know about that vicious fiend?

201181.text: Investigating? I don't know what you want to know, but you should give up this unrealistic idea!

201182.text: It attacks whoever enters the woods for no reason. Several of my men have already met with misfortune.

201183.text: It's a beast that we are talking about!

201184.text: It's very dangerous ahead. Let's head back to the village now.

201185.text: We are almost running out of food. What should we do...

201187.text: How strange this is! This place seems to have been set up with magic. There must be something hidden inside.

201188.text: Maybe we can find the secret of the blizzard.

201189.text: But how can we get in?

201190.text: Stop there. You don't appear to be someone from the village.

201191.text: Are you a henchman of the Fallen God?

201194.text: Stop there! Don't get any closer!

201195.text: One step closer and I shall release my arrow!

201196.text: I said stop there! Tell us, do you work for the Fallen God?

201197.text: We will never yield to the Fallen God!

201200.text: Human brat! How dare you try to pass through the boundary!

201202.text: Is this the bear that the elders in the village talked about...

201204.text: Are you the pet of the Fallen God?

201205.text: The terrible one who attacked everyone climbing up the mountain!

201206.text: How brazen, and how dare you insult the prestigious Her Saintess!

201207.text: You need to be taught a lesson to have a taste of what fear really is!

201208.text: Those who try to pass through the boundary will be slain. Arrogant humans, prepare to die!

201209.text: Humans are only good at bragging!

201211.text: How did you know my name?

201212.text: You don't look like the guys of the Chivalric Order. Human brat, who are you?

201213.text: Whoever you are, anyone who crosses the boundary shall die!

201214.text: Ugh, I've used too much strength before this.

201215.text: You... You... How did you know...

201216.text: How did you walk into the boundary?

201217.text: Hervoraltar will never answer questions from a human.

201218.text: Human... it looks like you know quite a lot. But no one can disobey the will of Her Saintess.

201219.text: For this world, for this world, Her Saintess has...

201220.text: Human, go to the boundary on the hillside.

201221.text: Her Saintess is over there. If you have questions, just ask Her Saintess yourself.

201222.text: I saw something familiar in your eyes...

201223.text: I was once full of doubts about my own choices...

201224.text: Never mind, I've said too much.

201225.text: Human, go find Her Saintess, if you have the nerve.

201226.text: Thank you for saving me. I'm sorry to have misunderstood you.

201227.text: My father is the leader of the hunters in the village. Everyone calls him Silverbow.

201229.text: My father has been leading the villagers to survive in this frozen world.

201230.text: Like the others in the village, he just took it for granted that this blizzard is a natural disaster and has accepted it as a fact of life.

201231.text: He and the villagers have been fighting against the old hunters as well as the beasts in the mountain, but never thought about changing this harsh environment to address the issue once and for all.

201233.text: Yes, I disagree with my father. I've been doubting the authenticity of these legends.

201234.text: If the legends are true, then maybe the Fallen God has created the blizzard.

201235.text: And if there's a way to defeat the Fallen God, maybe the blizzard will stop.

201236.text: I could faintly sense magic since I was young. Recently I can feel the magic here has been growing stronger.

201237.text: Then I started my investigation and found the boundary here.

201238.text: Should I tell her about the greater disaster if the blizzard stops?

201239.text: What's wrong? You seem to know something. Is it the way to stop the blizzard?

201240.text: Just now, that giant bear also said that you seemed to know something. The Fallen God is the cause of everything, right?

201241.text: Oh, you know how to pass through the boundary?

201242.text: The hunting grounds in the foothills are right across the tundra. I can feel the magic is the strongest over there. Maybe that is where the entrance lies.

201244.text: Just now, that giant bear also mentioned that. It's the Fallen God that is the cause of everything!

201245.text: That looks like an ancient magic device. It can launch spherical magic bullets after being imbued with magic.

201246.text: But I don't know what to aim at. Maybe something nearby?

201247.text: Hey, is this the entrance? Great! We finally found it!

201249.text: What are you waiting for, come!

201250.text: It's a fork road. What now? Which way should we go?

201251.text: That's what I thought. Let's split up.

201252.text: Let's meet here again after the investigation!

201253.text: Well, I'll go that way then. See you later!

201254.text: Darn it. Where did these guys come from? I've never seen them before...

201256.text: They are really nasty to deal with. Haha, my friend, you have helped me once again.

201257.text: What are you holding in your hand? Did those monsters drop it?

201258.text: I'm not sure. I've been following this path since we separated.

201259.text: I didn't expect to encounter those monsters. They directly attacked me without saying a word.

201260.text: Thank goodness that you showed up just in time!

201262.text: From what I can remember, this mountain has been covered in snow and ice forever. There's nothing but coldness.

201264.text: I wonder where the hot steams come from. If only the villagers could use them to keep warm!

201265.text: Looks like there's nothing else to be investigated nearby. Not too fruitful in my opinion.

201266.text: What's wrong? What are you thinking about?

201267.text: Let's get out of the boundary now. We may encounter those dangerous creatures again!

201268.text: Whew, we are finally out of there. Even though we didn't find out much, I still want to report everything we've seen to my father.

201269.text: Why don't you go back to the village with me to have a rest?

201270.text: It's about what that giant bear said, right? Alright, see you then.

201271.text: The blizzard on the mountain is getting heavier. Be careful out there!

201272.text: Little thing, how dare you mess with the traps we set up carefully. You cannot get away with this.

201274.text: This is what we shall do. Let's break one of its legs so that it can no longer...

201275.text: Who are you? How dare you tell the Chivalric Order what to do?

201276.text: Mind your own business. Kids should just stay away from adults' affairs!

201278.text: Looks like you are no ordinary human. Since you have drawn your wand towards the Chivalric Order, you have shown great disrespect to Her Saintess!

201281.text: It's you, that little nosy chump again! Why are you always in my way!

201282.text: Forget it. I'm no match for you.

201283.text: Remember to go to the boundary on the hillside. Her Saintess is over there...

201284.text: Thank you for saving me. I can't believe that monster is afraid of you!

201287.text: Urgh, I can't waste more time here. I still need to set up traps in the tundra outside the village.

201288.text: I'll definitely teach those old geezers a lesson this time.

201289.text: I've still got things to do. See you around.

201290.text: You are not going to stop him?

201291.text: You are completely different this time, meow.

201292.text: Seems you have also realized that some things are inevitable.

201294.text: Since you have decided to end the chaos in this world, then you should further dig out the truth about this world.

201295.text: You are a brave child too.

201296.text: Oh, you are here. Where have you been? We were all worried about you.

201297.text: Thank you for your kindness. You are really different from the other humans.

201298.text: There is indeed a magic trap of some sort nearby.

201299.text: Just walk across this place and you'll see a strange ice sculpture at the end of the tundra.

201300.text: There seems to be an invisible wall by the sculpture, blocking everyone out. Maybe that's where you want to take a look.

201301.text: I never thought a human would thank me one day. Actually I should be the one feeling grateful.

201302.text: The blizzard is getting heavier on the tundra. Please be careful!

201305.text: There's nothing we could do ready. I came here in search of the stored food I hid here before.

201306.text: If I can find the food, we don't have to take the risk to steal from the village anymore.

201307.text: Yes, this is a place where we used to live. We had plenty of food so we hid some under the snow.

201308.text: It's just that the wolf pack will attack us on sight. I...I dare not to go searching.

201309.text: The food is sufficient for us to migrate again to another place.

201310.text: I promise not to steal from the villagers again.

201311.text: Oh, this is the food we stored before.

201312.text: Howl... Thank you! The food is sufficient for us to migrate again.

201315.text: Cersivey looks me up and down.

201316.text: Her face suddenly clouded over as if something struck her...

201317.text: Despicable! Sneaked up on me when I was working on the magic circle...

201318.text: Never... I will never allow you to put this world into chaos again!

201319.text: You want to insult me? Is that your revenge?

201321.text: Lady Cersivey, you have misunderstood her intention.

201323.text: We have met before during the War of Protectors.

201324.text: You have the wrong person. Please look closer. She's not Lady Ereshkigal.

201325.text: Those eyes...Yes, I will never forget the arrogance in her eyes.

201326.text: Well then, you must have broken into the boundary with a certain purpose. You are allowed to report now.

201327.text: (Sigh) Aren't you the one who's truly arrogant...

201328.text: (With a surprised expression) Why do you ask?

201329.text: So, you have also witnessed the end of this world?

201330.text: Are you trying to fix this world to seek atonement?

201331.text: If you are aware of all these things, you must have seen the end of this world.

201332.text: As for the Time Shifting ability, I've seen it before.

201333.text: It just never occurred to me that someone else also possesses that ability.

201334.text: You can see that the Geothermy here has been escalating. I can predict that the burst of lava will eventually destroy this world.

201335.text: Only by summoning a blizzard to cover this land with ice and snow can the geothermal surge be suppressed.

201336.text: (Sigh) I've also done some investigation, but I didn't find out the cause of the Geothermy.

201337.text: Geothermal activities have been more active recently. All I can do is to make the blizzard heavier.

201338.text: Meow, that must be the boundary set by Lady Cersivey... and the memory of all seems to have been erased as well.

201339.text: Meow, I think that was to protect the dignity of the Protector.

201341.text: This is my world. I don't need an outsider to help. You will just ruin it.

201342.text: Get out of the boundary and leave this world, now!

201343.text: Proud as always... Meow, all this talking has made me tired.

201344.text: With the crackling sound of the sticks, the fire erupted instantly.

201345.text: What are you talking about? There's a hidden boundary on the mountain top?

201346.text: Then the rumors seem to be true. Someone is brewing a plot.

201347.text: Father, you also heard of that?

201348.text: I just have a faint hunch that the conflict between us and the old hunters is not as simple as that.

201349.text: Even though my young wards have been going on about taking revenge on the old hunters, those men are really not that despicable.

201350.text: I've always had this feeling that there might be someone hiding behind who has been inciting all these conflicts.

201351.text: If there's a boundary, maybe the ones who created the conflicts for us are hiding right inside.

201352.text: Oh, the one I met outside the village...

201354.text: I met her outside the village, where I suggested her not to linger in the snow.

201355.text: Just as I suspected... someone has been plotting against us in secret this whole time. Those despicable guys are unforgivable!

201356.text: They are instructed by the Fallen God, aren't they?

201357.text: Darn it. I'm going back to round up some young men to head to the mountain top together!

201358.text: Don't try to stop me. I will make them pay!

201359.text: Father! Let her finish what she's saying.

201362.text: The blizzard was created to protect us?

201365.text: That's not the only reason. I saw the steaming crevices myself too.

201366.text: Alright, I believe you then. Is there anything I can do for you?

201367.text: Oh... The child has lost her entire family...

201369.text: Don't be afraid. Come with us to our village and it will be your new home.

201370.text: Don't worry. I'll take her back to the village.

201371.text: I do hope the blizzard could stop, but if at the expense of destroying this world...

201374.text: We are going back to the village. Do be careful!

201375.text: Oh right. I grabbed some warm clothes from the old hunters. Should keep you warm. Take this!

201377.text: Ugh, what kind of monsters are these?!

201378.text: Did you forget Her Saintess's order?

201379.text: We gotta seal the cracks in all places no matter what.

201380.text: I know, but where did these monsters come from?

201382.text: Your Great Saintess, I have failed to complete the quest you entrusted me with...

201384.text: How dare you ask us, Her Saintess's guards, to retreat!

201385.text: You are going to help us?

201386.text: We will never retreat. Have a glimpse of our willpower!

201390.text: We are here to seal the crevices in this place under the order of Her Saintess.

201391.text: Yet, just after sealing several of those cracks, we found ourselves besieged by those monsters.

201392.text: It was like they were trying to stop us.

201393.text: No, we have set up our camps not far from here.

201394.text: This place is full of crevices, so our captain ordered us to station here.

201396.text: If our captain is also on the quest, they will encounter those monsters too!

201397.text: You're right! We'd better hurry back to the campsite to support them!

201398.text: Sorry, we have to rush back now. See you around!

201400.text: No need to worry about me. I can still fight. Those monsters though...

201401.text: We encountered some of those just now. It seems like they are trying to stop us from sealing the cracks.

201403.text: Her Saintess has entrusted me with this quest of glory. I must complete it.

201405.text: Captain, you should find a way out of here first. Leave this place to us. We'll take care of things.

201409.text: No wonder Lord Hervoraltar lost to you. The power you possess is truly unbelievable.

201410.text: Young witch, thank you for your help.

201412.text: You have all made a great sacrifice. Take the injured to the castle where they can rest and recover.

201414.text: The Ice Crust? Could it be...

201415.text: That was a long time ago, back to when there was no threat of Geothermy. Things were all vibrant here.

201416.text: As the Protector, I run this world.

201417.text: Yet, one day, flames intruded this world.

201418.text: You heard me right. Those monsters wield Flame Magic. The abundance of them damaged this world recklessly with fire.

201419.text: They wanted nothing but to destroy. There's no way to communicate with them.

201420.text: The ancestors of the wolves and the humans here fought them bravely alongside my warriors. Many lives were lost.

201421.text: In the end, I sealed the rest of them with my Freezing Magic and buried them underground.

201422.text: After I summoned the blizzard, I erased everyone's memory. No one remembers the battles against those monsters anymore.

201423.text: The Ice Crust you saw on the monsters is most likely the result of my Freezing Magic.

201424.text: But since they have been sealed by my Freezing Magic, they shouldn't stand a chance of waking up again...

201425.text: Those monsters cannot think for themselves. All they have is the instinct to ruin everything with flames.

201426.text: If they ever woke up again, they would show themselves in no time, which would mean total destruction for this world.

201427.text: That's impossible. Geothermy has been going on for hundreds of years. If the Geothermy was created by them, they would have already rushed out trying to tear this world apart.

201428.text: I'll fully investigate everything. No one is allowed to destroy this world.

201429.text: I'll protect this world no matter what.

201430.text: Young witch, do not get mixed up in this. Go back to where you belong.

201431.text: Every time I see you, I just recall that abomination.

201432.text: Maybe the answer to the mystery is at the place where those monsters appeared.

201433.text: When did those monsters start to show up?

201435.text: So, where can I find those monsters?

201436.text: No, that shouldn't be what they aim at.

201438.text: Let's think about it more carefully.

201439.text: That can't be right. There have never been monsters in that place, and they have no reason to go there.

201440.text: Wait, maybe the monsters can be found in places full of crevices.

201441.text: But the cracks nearby have all been sealed already. Where can I find another place like this?

201442.text: Right, I remember there were huge crevices in the Saintess Square, where runny lava erupted. Maybe I can solve the mystery there.

201443.text: That's strange. Those guys from the Glorious Silverbow stopped their provocations!

201444.text: Hey! Don't come any closer. Go back to your village!

201445.text: I won't buy that just because you said so.

201446.text: Our grudge with the Silverbow is too deep to be solved merely by words alone.

201447.text: This is... what was stolen before.

201448.text: Did Silverbow send you here to trick me? Are you trying to clear my suspicion with this?

201449.text: I don't trust the words of others. I only believe what I see myself.

201450.text: Go back. I'll go to seek the truth with my own eyes.

201452.text: I grabbed it from that young fellow.

201453.text: I met him on the Frozen Lake Surface just now.

201454.text: He didn't strike back. How strange.

201456.text: I have heard about what happened from Lord Silverbow. He asked me to dismantle the traps here. These traps were prepared for the old guys.

201457.text: Oh! This is my precious bow. That old geezer grabbed it from me. Did you help me retrieve it?

201459.text: Erm... It's too complicated for me. I'm not that clever.

201460.text: Both Lord Silverbow and you say there's a misunderstanding. So I've chosen to believe you.

201461.text: People like me, who only know how to brawl and hunt, can make the conflict more complicated.

201462.text: So, I'd better say nothing and let him take my bow.

201463.text: Haha. Don't worry. Even without the bow, I can still hunt with my fists.

201464.text: Ah, you are the witch from earlier.

201466.text: Well, there are huge crevices in the Saintess Square, but everyone's so busy tending the injured that none of us has the time to seal them.

201467.text: That would be wonderful! The square is located deep in the castle.

201469.text: The captain at the gate has already briefed us on everything.

201470.text: Will the world be devoured by the Geothermal Surge?

201471.text: Nonsense. I'll not believe it without seeing it.

201473.text: Fear not, child. I will never let go!

201474.text: You old geezer, why are you...

201475.text: My body just moved on its own! Oh hell, I can't hold on any longer!

201478.text: I told you that I didn't mean to help. My body just moved on its own.

201484.text: Did she just come out of nowhere and assault us? What a dangerous one!

201486.text: Oh hell! Get ready for it!

201488.text: This is Cetess, the vice-captain of the Chivalric Order.

201489.text: A few months ago, I sent her to scout the crevices that recently appeared in the foothills, but she never returned.

201490.text: She is not the true perpetrator of the Geothermy. Seems like someone else is manipulating her.

201491.text: Yes. Someone who can wield powerful mind magic is holding sway over her.

201494.text: Cetess, my loyal chevalier. Seems like you have restored your consciousness.

201497.text: All I can remember is the ground cracked open, and then I fell into the abyss.

201498.text: Down there, a bunch of Lava Monsters attacked me. Then... then...

201500.text: Don't push yourself so hard. You are quite weak right now. Go back to the Chivalric Order and get some rest.

201501.text: It seems the real culprit is lurking underground.

201502.text: This feeling... The source of the Geothermy should be down there.

201504.text: Do you feel that too? Magic power has been accumulating ahead, which must be the real cause behind Snegurochka's demolition.

201505.text: We've returned, and this time... things will be different.

201506.text: It seems, this time, we can change the fate of Snegurochka and save it from total destruction.

201507.text: Go and fix Snegurochka. Save it from destruction.

201509.text: Looks like my children have taken good care of you.

201510.text: I am Sinmara the Inferno, serving the great Lady Ereshkigal.

201511.text: Just as I expected, a jackal of that abhorrent witch.

201512.text: Cersivey, all you've left to offer is your empty talk.

201513.text: My master suffered from enough humiliations in the War of Protectors. And here I am to take revenge for her and destroy all of you completely.

201514.text: Are those disgusting monsters your henchmen?

201515.text: Watch your tongue. These adorable kids are my gifts to you all.

201517.text: Yup. They can only live in a world of magma and fire.

201518.text: Therefore, they will destroy everything in their sight with fire, making an environment suitable for them to reproduce. Just like what you see right now.

201520.text: They were sealed by you with Freezing Magic, but still point a way for me to the Geothermy here.

201521.text: You must have also felt it, this splendid temperature...

201523.text: You Protectors are indeed powerful. It cost an enormous amount of magic and took me quite some time to gradually unseal them.

201524.text: It's impossible to defeat the Protector of this world just on my own, therefore, I need these kids. I need them all to be awakened.

201525.text: Also, to curb the surging Geothermy, you have set a gigantic magic circle to bring the blizzard, which has consumed most of your magic, hasn't it?

201526.text: Now, my children have all awoken. Soon, very soon, this world will burn in hell's flames.

201528.text: It seems we have more guests here.

201530.text: Ah, I've done all of these wholeheartedly, only for the sake of you.

201531.text: My heart was ripped apart upon seeing you sealed.

201532.text: But now you are finally back...

201533.text: Ah, have you any idea how anxiously I've been waiting for this day?

201534.text: Alas, looks like it's just an empty puppet.

201535.text: Indeed. How stupid I am. You are still being tortured in the dark Abyss.

201536.text: It must be those reprehensible Protectors behind this farce of puppet.

201537.text: This is a humiliation to the noble and beautiful you. I shall let this puppet pay for this sin.

201538.text: Ah, the cursed Protectors. They not only sealed you, but also humiliated you with this abomination.

201540.text: Imbecile. You think you can defeat me so easily?

201541.text: This is my true form, slumbering in the magic core. You can't defeat me by just shattering the vessel!

201545.text: No, the Geothermy is going ballistic. If this goes on, my world will...

201547.text: My master, you were in great danger and triggered the ability of Time Shifting.

201548.text: It can take a tremendous toll on your body, so please don't push yourself too hard.

201549.text: That was a close one. Were it not for the Intangible Shifting, you would have surely died in the magma burst.

201550.text: You have returned to a time in the past... This is Snegurochka before its devastation.

201551.text: The Snegurochka before the Intangible Shifting has been destroyed. Lava devoured the entire world.

201552.text: Maybe the Frost of Absolute Zero can neutralize her great explosion.

201553.text: This delicate magical item is made of ice and never melts. It's said that it can suppress any heat or explosion.

201554.text: Seeing the hidden flowing of magic will help you perceive the true nature of things.

201555.text: Ah! You mean the barrier made of ice!

201556.text: That's a masterpiece of La Crima.

201557.text: So you have obtained the Eternal Ice from the Saintess?

201558.text: Luckily, I happen to have an Ice Cryolite.

201559.text: Please allow me to take you to La Crima.

201560.text: Only she's in possession of the rare Tear of Magic.

201561.text: She's in the front of the castle. But she doesn't like to be bothered by others and has blocked the way with her Gem Magic.

201562.text: Still lack the materials for the Invisible Mirror. It's impossible to stop Sinmara without it.

201563.text: Search in the castle again but be more careful this time.

201568.text: Why? Why do you come to me?

201570.text: Despicable Witch... A filthy being like you cannot exist in this world!

201571.text: Welcome to the Shop. Please enjoy your shopping here.

201572.text: Please feel free to shop here.

201573.text: Are there monsters on both the east and west sides?

201574.text: Don't worry. I'll protect the village. Go hide yourselves.

201575.text: It seems that only by eliminating all the monsters in the tower can safety and peace be brought back to the village.

201576.text: I'll repel the monsters in the west. As for the east, over to you.

201577.text: Even your world is under threat because of Irminsul's chaos?

201578.text: All of these are merely speculations. If only we could find more evidence.

201579.text: May the wind be always at your back. Best of luck.

201581.text: Why did you know the secret of the Chronospace?

201582.text: Nevertheless, what you have done is nothing but an act of pure selfishness. You persecuted my people in favor of your world.

201583.text: Though their ending remains the same, my people should sacrifice for me. All is to prevent Irminsul from falling apart.

201584.text: Ribbit... ribbit. Thanks for your help. I shall go on fulfilling my mission.

201585.text: Until our paths cross again. And may your soul be redeemed too!

201586.text: That's why you entered the tower? To exterminate those monsters?

201587.text: Do you remember a village around the tower? There are only woods around here.

201588.text: Only a few monsters have escaped from the tower so far. The chaos of other worlds just started to erode this world.

201589.text: Perhaps your deep slumber has affected your memory.

201591.text: The west and east sides of the village are again infested with monsters rushing out of the tower!

201592.text: Hey, you have returned. Thanks for your help last time. I just found the legend of the treasure has attracted more people to come here.

201593.text: Yes. My fellows and I saw someone mysterious while exploring the tower.

201594.text: Seems to be an alchemist. Very suspicious.

201595.text: Keep your eyes peeled. And hopefully next time we meet, you can tell me more information about the treasure.

201601.text: Finally... finally I have completely sealed the Geothermy.

201602.text: No need for that anymore. All is over.

201603.text: The long cold night has passed...

201607.text: Young witch, you have distinguished yourself from that woe-bringer. You have truly saved this world.

201608.text: It seems that there are other missions waiting for you.

201609.text: Let's part from here. My world is in ruins. I shall restore it to its former glory.

201610.text: Oh... You are here for a Frost of Absolute Zero...

201612.text: I need Eternal Ice and Tear of Magic. Do you have them?

201613.text: Ah, Tear of Magic. I can manage that.

201615.text: Hmm, I still need more drops of Tear of Magic. Turn around and wait a second.

201617.text: Remember, don't turn back before I say so.

201619.text: (Murmuring) Hmm, Tear of Magic. Not really anything sad happened recently...

201620.text: Should I fetch some onions from the castle?

201623.text: Your Frost of Absolute Zero is here.

201624.text: Please... please, don't come back to me ever again!

201625.text: You can make souls collected from different worlds tangible and have them fight for you in combat.

201627.text: It seems you have forgotten everything.

201628.text: You were born with this ability.

201629.text: This place used to be safeguarded by the Protector but now it is totally deserted, even occupied by all sorts of monsters.

201632.text: The mirror in front seems to be able to rotate and adjust the light's direction...

201633.text: This is the way we came. Let's go take a look up ahead...

201641.text: It seems the chest over there contains something...

201644.text: I just felt power flowing into my body.

201645.text: The thought of saving others has charged me with extra power.

201650.text: I am collecting the shards of the Mirror.

202396.text: Don't be frightened. I mean you no harm...

202397.text: Is there anything I can help you with?

202398.text: Erm, you don't look like a villain.

202399.text: I need a white flower to make a styptic to stop her bleeding but this kind of flower grows in the northern Wilderness where mass of monsters appear lately. I'm too scared to go there so I'll just have to carry her to the village first.

202400.text: Don't worry, I'll help you look for them.

202402.text: Really? But there are many monsters! It's dangerous!

202405.text: I don't think you're bragging. But still, be careful. I'll wait for you in the Tote Village at the end of the Wilderness. Run if it gets too dangerous. Don't push yourself too hard please.

202406.text: White flowers should be found in the northern part. The color makes them quite easy to spot.

202408.text: Hey, little girls there, go back home. This place is teeming with monsters.

202409.text: Tell him the reason for finding the White Flower.

202410.text: I am looking for the White Flower...

202411.text: I'll pick up a white flower and send it to the village. You'd better leave now. It's full of dangers here.

202412.text: This is the place. White flowers should be around here. Let's go find one.

202413.text: Wonderful. It's this kind of flower that can stop the bleeding.

202420.text: It's a dangerous place flooded with monsters. Just leave.

202423.text: What? You have defeated the Magical Servants?

202424.text: Sorry. I should apologize first. I'm Datheios, the Balance Enforcer.

202425.text: The swarming monsters around have scared everyone away. Thus I arranged the Magical Servants here to deal with the monsters but I didn't expect this would put you in danger.

202426.text: I almost committed a crime. I'm terribly sorry. Please forgive me.

202428.text: Don't do such a dangerous thing again.

202429.text: Thanks for your understanding. Monsters frequent this place. Don't linger around. It's unwise.

202430.text: Negotiate the eastern wilderness, cross a stone bridge, and you shall arrive at the Tote Village.

202434.text: You look like a noble spell caster from the Upper Domain. Don't worry. I'm too old to give you any trouble.

202436.text: I am not a noble from the Upper Domain...

202437.text: Am I too old to catch your words? You must be joking. Rest assured. I always obey the order from the Upper Domain. I won't have conflicts with you.

202439.text: Do you want me to walk you home?

202440.text: ...Ah, the way home...I don't have a home anymore!

202443.text: See the cliffs there...? Three days ago I still lived there!

202444.text: On that day...my...my son was playing with my grandson in the backyard. My daughter-in-law was preparing lunch while I was taking a wooden basin full of laundry to the creek.

202445.text: Suddenly, the earth started trembling and the houses kept shaking. The crevices appeared soon.

202446.text: God, it was a hellish scene! The apocalypse! Doomsday!

202449.text: Although earthquakes have occurred in the Lower Domain a couple of times, they never struck here before!

202450.text: (Crying) My poor families...The entire village fell off the cliffs!

202451.text: Dear lord...My home...Where is my home?

202454.text: What do you know about it?

202456.text: How would I know about that meow? But since Cassiel has been separated into Floating Isles, how can earthquakes strike it though and where could the hypocenter be?

202457.text: Maybe it has something to do with the monsters.

202458.text: Perhaps...A lot of strange things have happened since the preacher came here.

202459.text: Have you seen the monsters here before?

202461.text: I can't remember. It's different from the dark power that manipulates souls. These monsters have no consciousness. All they have is the impulse to destroy everything in sight. Keep your eyes wide open. They can be more than dangerous.

202462.text: Why are they still out there? Are they in trouble?

202463.text: Ah... Finally, you are back. It's nice to see you in one piece.

202466.text: Oh, thank you. The village is up ahead. I'll lead the way. Catch up!

202467.text: My home locates in the southeast of the village. Make it quick.

202468.text: I saw beautiful wildflowers in the fields outside the village. I wanna pick some. Let's regroup over there!

202471.text: Of course, I will be fine.

202473.text: Sorcerer of the Upper Domain, stop! Don't get closer!

202476.text: You are not invited here. You have robbed us of everything valuable. What else do you want?

202477.text: Spare me! I have handed over all my crops. There's nothing more I can offer to the Protector.

202478.text: I have no food left. Nothing! Please!

202479.text: There's nothing we can pay. Please spare us.

202482.text: Liar! The neighboring village was destroyed by sorcerers from the Upper Domain. All of the villagers were slain...

202484.text: True! My little sister lived there. Her family of three was killed by your kind!

202485.text: Give the White Flower to Tuonel

202486.text: Let me work on the styptic.

202487.text: It's done. I'll paste it on you, and bandage your wounds. It will hurt a little.

202489.text: Okay. The wound has stopped bleeding. You'd better lie down and rest for a few days. Feel free to recover at my home.

202490.text: Thank you...I'm Nemesi, a resident of the Lower Domain.

202491.text: You are welcome. Take a good rest. I'll go fetch some water.

202493.text: Please spare us. The drought is getting worse and our crops are doomed. We don't have any left.

202494.text: Right. The Northern Farmland is occupied by monsters. No one dares to farm there any more.

202495.text: We are having less and less space to farm, and we are running out of food.

202496.text: Should it not be the nobles of the Upper Domain, you were all killed by monsters. Don't you feel obliged to hand over some crops as tributes?

202497.text: We thank you for killing the monsters, but the crops are running short, far from enough...

202498.text: Not handing out your crops will be treated as disobeying the Protector.

202499.text: (To his men) Hey, listen up. By order of the Protector, we confiscate all of your crops.

202500.text: Move. Stay out of our way!

202502.text: Ah, you must be the assassin who frequently assaults sorcerers in the Lower Domain! This morning you also attacked the guards who were escorting the crops in the neighboring village.

202503.text: You bastards know nothing other than robbing our crops. It's time to pay.

202504.text: You may know how to fight, but that doesn't change the fact a peasant incapable of magic you are. Time for you fool to witness the true magic.

202506.text: What's wrong? All talks but no walks?

202510.text: Reprehensible! As a sorcerer, you dare to help these rioters! I won't let you get off next time!

202512.text: Thank you for your assistance. Nemesi of the Alliance of the Rebellions will never forget your kindness.

202513.text: Ah. The Alliance of the Rebellions...that secret group fighting against the upper rulers?

202514.text: Yes. We all had rough of their slavery and exploitation. We had kept silent because of our incapability of magic.

202515.text: But our silence had only encouraged their unscrupulousness. We will meet our end in their hands long before the monsters finish us.

202516.text: Therefore, we founded the Alliance of the Rebellions. United, we will topple their tyranny. I took my orders to stop those who lord it over the Lower Domain.

202519.text: I know apothecary. I can offer my help if you don't mind.

202521.text: Although you wield magic, you are different from other sorcerers. You are kind-hearted. Will you join us?

202524.text: Good. We have another company. I overdid myself, and now the wound hurts...

202525.text: Can I ask you a favor?

202528.text: I was going to meet the leader under the tree at the end of the Flower Fields outside the village. I can't make it now. Can you go there to tell him I am recovering here and the residents are willing to join the Alliance?

202531.text: Thank you. Set a pile of leaves alight under the tree at the entrance to the Flower Fields. It's our signal.

202532.text: My dagger. Give it to him. He should trust you.

202533.text: Sorry. I thought you were one of the bastards of the Upper Domain. They never labor but still steal all our efforts!

202534.text: Our ancestors used to live on the ground. Later, the monsters swarmed in, and the Protector used magic to lift Cassiel to the sky and protect us against them.

202535.text: Decades ago though, the monsters started to have wings, but only for a small number. The sorcerers from the Upper Domain eliminated them quickly.

202536.text: But now, more and more monsters appear. As we depend on the sorcerers to fend off the monsters, we have turned a blind eye to their tyranny.

202537.text: The Floating Isles are rising while the crops are running short. If it keeps up like this, all of us will starve to death.

202538.text: In the air, Cassiel was split into different floating isles. Sorcerers controlled the Upper Domain. With abundant resources, they have built prosperous cities.

202539.text: Those who can't cast spells were not allowed to enter the Upper Domain. This land under our feet is called the Lower Domain. We've been working on this land for generations. We hand over most of our crops in exchange for the sorcerers' protection.

202541.text: Yes. Only sorcerers can defeat those monsters. Even though the harvests these past years are getting worse, they are still forcing us to hand over the crops. We cannot bear it anymore.

202542.text: As if things weren't hard enough, earthquakes are striking the margin of the Floating Isles. Rumor has it that a village has fallen off. Villagers are panicking.

202543.text: Do you know what causes the earthquakes?

202544.text: They have occurred several times just around here. We're scared. Some say they saw sorcerers around a few days before the earthquakes.

202545.text: Others believe it's the sorcerer's revenge because the villages hit by earthquakes have turned against the Upper Domain officials. That's why we were frightened when you came to the village.

202546.text: Ah, I am sorry for mistaking you for the spiteful sorcerers.

202547.text: Why do you hate the sorcerers so much?

202548.text: (Sigh) The neighboring village fell off the Floating Isles a few days ago. None survived. My poor sister...All of her family...

202549.text: Before the accident, some saw sorcerers in the village. It must be their deeds.

202552.text: Oh, I don't have any proof yet, but the noble sorcerers came here last week and took all the crops.

202553.text: Now, we hide our crops in other places. I hid mine by the Flower Fields. There's a secret passage. Few know it.

202554.text: But I am still worried. Can you take a look there for me? I just want to make sure the crops are safe.

202555.text: Also, I have left some savings in the Flower Fields. If you find the crops, consider the savings my thanks.

202557.text: You are... the girl who gathered herbs before. What are you doing here?

202559.text: Don't fool around here. There are monsters around. It's dangerous.

202563.text: This is...Why do you have Nemesi's dagger?

202565.text: I see. The wounded one is Nemesi. Thank you for taking care of her. I'm Garditis.

202566.text: I still can't believe my ears. You are not a resident of Cassiel. Why did you come here?

202569.text: An outsider preacher? Ah, a strange man has appeared in the Lower Domain. He has been murmuring about forbidden magic. No one has a clue.

202571.text: My companion has seen him at the checkpoint. You may find clues there. I am going to pay a visit to Nemesi. Will you come with me?

202572.text: I will be after the preacher.

202573.text: Monsters are rampant here. Keep your eyes peeled. Goodbye then.

202574.text: I've found my way home. Thank you. Keep this flower.

202577.text: Don't worry. I wield magic, too. Monster can't hurt me. Bye.

202578.text: Welcome, my master. Who was that girl?

202580.text: You have been always helping others. So kind.

202581.text: Ah, my apology. I'm here to inform you that the wounded alchemist and elementalist have received proper treatment. They shall recover soon as long as they rest well, so please don't worry about them.

202585.text: I feel something is staring at here. It may be my imagination.

202586.text: Have a good rest. Don't overdo it. I'll be waiting for you at the Hall of Origin.

202587.text: He is with that guy this time...

202588.text: What a disaster! The transport team was ambushed by monsters. We worked so hard to collect the crops!

202589.text: I escaped alone. Most likely though, misfortune has befallen the rest of the guards...Nothing went smooth in the Lower Domain.

202592.text: You are... the one who stood in my way! Were it not for you, we could have finished collecting the crops long ago.

202593.text: It's all your fault. We had to harvest the crops in the foothills by ourselves. We didn't expect to be ambushed by monsters. My dear fellows...

202596.text: We are just following the orders from the Lord Protector. If we don't collect enough food here, everyone in the Upper Domain will starve to death.

202597.text: To slay monsters in the Lower Domain, we may get wounded or even lose our lives. Is there any problem asking those villagers to provide us with some crops?

202598.text: But they also need to feed themselves.

202599.text: They know nothing about magic. Are you going to count on them to fight against monsters? That's ridiculous!

202600.text: No. I can't go back like this. I have to save my fellows!

202602.text: Ribbit. The locals work hard just like my kind, but why are the crops so stunted...

202603.text: Is that because of the scorching sunlight? Ribbit. If the situation goes on, the villagers here will have to starve again.

202604.text: Evil monster, face Phrygia, the Glorious Chevalier of Irminsul!

202607.text: Ah, good to see you again. We may catch up in a minute. Let me deal with this big guy first.

202608.text: Fear not. I have slain the monster.

202609.text: Thank you for avenging my fellows. There's no point for me to stay here then...

202610.text: Ribbity-rok. It's good to see you in one piece.

202612.text: How did you end up here?

202613.text: Ribbit. I am not so sure. I've been traveling around, seeking a way to lift the curse. But still, nothing substantial.

202614.text: I saw that monster attacking him. As a chevalier, I'm obliged to step forward and protect those in need.

202616.text: Didn't expect that the people in this world also need help. I can't sit by and watch. Ribbit. I've decided to help the residents of the Lower Domain.

202617.text: Tote Village? I will help the villagers there get rid of monsters first. May blesses be with you too.

202618.text: Terrified of the powerful while bullying the weak...This land is full of injustice. The rebels only wish to survive. There's nothing wrong with that.

202619.text: Maybe Garditis is right. This world needs a revolution. The Protector's three magic items are indeed necessary...They are the keys to changing everything.

202620.text: Ah, you are...You'd better not linger around. Monsters are becoming more active these days. It's dangerous here.

202621.text: Tell him about you looking for the preacher.

202622.text: Have you seen a strange preacher?

202623.text: Yes, I have seen him. The magic he used is so sickening that it's still fresh in my mind.

202624.text: I've warned the Magical Guards many times that he cannot be trusted, but the guards believe his magic can help eliminate monsters. They've fully cooperated with him.

202627.text: The Magical Guards, composed of sorcerers of the Upper Domain, are loyal to the Protector. On a daily basis, their duty is to safeguard the stability of Cassiel. When the monsters show up to wreak havoc, they are also responsible for eliminating them.

202628.text: The Upper Domain has asked the Lower Domain to turn in crops. It's the Magical Guards who are in charge of collecting crops from the Lower Domain. Due to the decreasing yields, there are often conflicts between the Magical Guards and the villagers.

202629.text: If you want to find that hateful man, search the ruins of the Pelenier Village.

202630.text: That village has been razed and occupied by monsters. The Magical Guards and that man are planning on how to repel the monsters there.

202634.text: Thanks to Tuonel, I feel much better. Also, thank you.

202635.text: Lord Garditis has asked me to get in touch with other villages, in the hope of uniting all the villagers and fighting against the merciless sorcerers.

202638.text: We are seeking companions who are willing to overthrow the tyranny together. Since monsters are showing up everywhere, our communication is at the risk of being broken by all those monsters.

202639.text: I can help you eliminate the monsters.

202640.text: Lord Garditis and I trust your magic, but combats are always full of danger. Take care of yourself. I'm going to complete my quest. Bye.

202641.text: Ribbit. Good to see you again.

202644.text: I've met the leader of the rebellions, whose courage is more than admirable. I hear sorcerers are forcing villagers to hand out crops. Phrygia, the Chevalier of Irminsul, swears to help those in need.

202645.text: May light shine upon your path forward.

202646.text: This cunning man tricked all of us!

202649.text: The Magical Guards just got a new sorcerer whose magic can weaken monsters. Other members were sent here to assist him with eliminating the monsters nearby.

202650.text: It turns out that man could manipulate those monsters!

202653.text: His magic is something that we've never seen before. The monsters he controlled attacked us crazily. I'm the only one that managed to escape.

202654.text: I need to report this as soon as possible. I cannot let my teammates die in vain.

202657.text: I was just wondering who that could be. A nobody I see. You see, this is the evidence of my power. God's power is mine now.

202658.text: Too late. You don't stand a chance!

202660.text: I just want to restore order...

202661.text: With this power, it's easy to either bring order or completely destroy a world. Look, these inferior creatures can sense the power of my magic. They now fully heed my orders.

202663.text: Haha. I am chosen to inherit the God's power. With the help of these monsters, I can snatch the Sacred Relic at the top of the tower and become the new God.

202664.text: It seems you also know some peculiar magic. Sooner or later, you will stand in my way. C'mon, hand over your magic now and let it be part of my strength!

202665.text: Why? Why do you possess such power?

202666.text: Impossible. I'm supposed to be the new God. This power is mine!

202667.text: I will get the Sacred Relic, the symbol of God.

202668.text: You are not running away from this

202670.text: Better check on your friends first. Hahahaha!

202672.text: Is that the voice of the giant monster under the Floating Isles? Has it awoken? I'll send someone to check. Are you alright?

202675.text: We met the escaping noble from the Upper Domain. He told us you were after that monster manipulator alone. We were worried about you, so here we are.

202678.text: Monsters are piling up. If this keeps up, more people will fall into misfortune.

202679.text: People here are scared of monsters and can only rely on sorcerers to deal with them. That's why they have to put up with the exploitation

202680.text: If we manage to slay the monsters nearby, they shall be more confident that they don't need to depend on the sorcerers for help. Then more will be willing to be united to overthrow the tyranny.

202681.text: Phrygia, the Chevalier of Irminsul, will come to help. Are you coming?

202682.text: Hang on. Can I take a look at that ring?

202685.text: I'm not so sure, but I think I saw this ring in the Sanctuary. Why is it in your hands?

202687.text: In this case, he probably stole it from the Sanctuary. It must be an important item, but I'm not sure how it works or its abilities.

202688.text: Keep it well. You may need it someday.

202689.text: Good to see you. You look on edge.

202691.text: Exactly as I expected, humans may be driven by their ambition to taste the forbidden magic, which will eventually get them devoured. Those who have been allured by this magic won't give it up easily.

202692.text: Oh no, the others in the tower...

202693.text: Calm down. Don't you still have a mission to fulfill here? Plus, the preacher is injured and needs time to recover.

202694.text: Yes. Some people need me here.

202695.text: Don't worry. No one can control that power except you. Others who dabble in it will only result in self-destruction. Rest assured and go fulfill your mission.

202701.text: (Yawning) What is this place? Who are you? I was chasing after a butterfly and ended up here.

202703.text: I see. I just fell asleep here. I don't know this place. (Weeping) Is this where people called 'the Lower Domain'?

202704.text: I didn't expect I would come here, just for going after a butterfly. What should I do now? I can't find my way back...

202705.text: Ask her where her home is.

202707.text: I live in the Sanctuary. I know the Upper Domain very well. If you can take me to the Upper Domain, I can easily find my way home.

202709.text: Are you worried about me because of the monsters in the Lower Domain? Thank you. I'm Afallen. Nice to meet you.

202711.text: Ah, there's someone I know. Garditis!

202712.text: Afallen, you are supposed to guard the entrance to the Sanctuary. Why are you here?

202713.text: I saw a beautiful butterfly and wanted to play with it. I was chasing after it, and ended up here without even noticing.

202714.text: This kind lady is willing to escort me to the Upper Domain.

202715.text: I see. Afallen is a sweet but naive child. She might fall a prey to monsters. Please, escort her to the Upper Domain.

202716.text: I have other matters to attend to, see you.

202717.text: Why is Garditis leaving in such a hurry?

202720.text: Garditis was the watchman of the Sanctuary, but he preferred a freer life and then resigned. Then, the Protector asked me to watch the Sanctuary.

202721.text: I didn't expect that he came to the Lower Domain.

202726.text: Monsters frequent the Lower Domain. It's quite dangerous. I'm on my way back to the Sanctuary. Afallen, are you coming with me?

202728.text: Afallen, wait for me at the junction ahead. I need to have a word with her.

202729.text: I've heard many things about you: helping the residents of the Lower Domain, eliminating monsters, and even defeating that monster manipulator. Because of you, the villagers have regained their confidence.

202730.text: You made the impossible possible. Truly marvelous.

202731.text: Now that Garditis has a friend like you, maybe he can actually bring a revolution to this world...

202734.text: He's different from me. Once he is determined, he will work hard for it.

202735.text: He used to guard the Sanctuary. Witnessing the atrocities committed in the Lower Domain, he decided to unite the suppressed villagers and overthrow the tyranny. He is contacting his companions in nearby villages.

202736.text: Of course, the nobles of the Upper Domain noticed that as well. Even the Sanctuary has sent assassins. When you see him, remind him to take care of himself.

202737.text: Who sent you? The Upper Domain? Or the Protector in the Sanctuary?

202739.text: You are the target of Inn & Lou. That's all you need to know.

202740.text: Ah, it's you. Why are you here?

202741.text: Tell him the words of Datheios.

202742.text: The Sanctuary sent them, I see...

202743.text: You over there. Since you are helping the target we are hunting, we shall put you on the wanted list too.

202744.text: The target is still on the list. Need to find another opportunity.

202745.text: Thank you for saving me. These two kids should be the Executors of the Sanctuary. Top assassins.

202746.text: I was contacting my allies in this area and we shall make a strike against the giant monster.

202748.text: You haven't seen it? There's a gigantic monster perching under the clouds. A large number of monsters live on it, taking it as a springboard to invade the Lower Domain.

202749.text: It's always believed that the constant rise of Floating Isles is the key to keeping the monsters in a distance, because no one can eradicate them all.

202750.text: If the giant monster can be defeated, the residents of the Lower Domain, and even the sorcerers of the Upper Domain will probably change their minds.

202751.text: United, we can defeat the monster. There's no need to keep the Floating Isles rising to escape this.

202752.text: My friend, I need to contact my fellows. We'll team up and wipe that giant monster out.

202753.text: We need your strength. With your help, we shall defeat the giant monster. Please.

202756.text: Great! I will lead the villagers to the shelters first. Nemesi will lure that big one to the Spiral Perch. Dear friend, let's regroup there and kill the monster!

202760.text: Ah! Nice to see you again. What a great surprise! I heard the Alliance of the Rebellions is uniting a team to repel that giant monster.

202761.text: I am not a warrior, but I wanna offer my help. I made this healing potion. I wanted to give it to Nemesi, but I can't find her anywhere.

202762.text: I will hand it to her for you.

202763.text: Thank you. The villagers all tried to persuade me not to come because of the monsters. I feel relieved now that this is in your hands.

202765.text: Finally, the luring potion that I hid before can be put to good use. This time, we shall kill that gigantic monster. Who is hiding there? Show yourself.

202768.text: Thank you. I need to lure the big one to the Spiral Perch. We will destroy it. I'll see you there.

202770.text: Tell him about the Giant Monster.

202771.text: Cassiel didn't have such a tremendous monster before, at least not in my memory, although I could be wrong.

202772.text: It's impossible to defeat it with just a single blow. It's perilous to fight against it. Meow. Take care.

202773.text: You are here as well. This place should be far enough in case of hurting the innocent during the combat.

202774.text: Let me deal with this big one...

202775.text: Rest assured. We will handle those smaller ones!

202779.text: There will be no more earthquakes!

202780.text: I extend my greatest gratitude to you. Without you, we couldn't have united, let alone defeat this giant monster.

202781.text: Now everyone has regained their confidence, eager to get back down to the ground and start a new life.

202782.text: The only obstacle now is the ruling of the Upper Domain. I will negotiate with the Protector to lower the Floating Isles down to the ground.

202785.text: What? Why? The giant monster is not the cause of the earthquakes?

202787.text: I guess I'll have to go up to find the answer.

202788.text: Seems that it's not yet the time to celebrate. See you in the Upper Domain.

202791.text: Dejase, how dare you practice the forbidden magic? It's not too late to give up now, otherwise the Church will have you executed…

202792.text: Anemone, even you try to hinder my studies? It's just a long lost magic. If I can master it, I'll never lose to you again…

202793.text: Huh? Anemone never loses! Anemone will strike you down and bring you back to the Church!

202795.text: See? As long as I am able to master more magic, no one will be able to stand against the great alchemist!

202796.text: Why... the gifted alchemist... is defeated by Anemone...

202797.text: Hahahaha... I admire your courage to challenge Anemone!

202798.text: It's not over yet! You who seek the dark have earned your last slumber in darkness!

202808.text: You are?... I see. That's why you are following her?

202809.text: Are you still sitting on the sidelines?

202810.text: I have no reason to help you.

202812.text: But I'm in no position to judge as well.

202814.text: The error will merely keep repeating itself pointlessly...

202815.text: Silverbow is our enemy. As long as he is here, the fight will never end!

202816.text: I want to confirm this misunderstanding...

202817.text: There's no need for a dispute.

202819.text: Stay away from the mountain top!

202822.text: It's of no use, even if you defeat the Protector at the mountain top, this world will still be destroyed.

202824.text: I'll find the source of the blizzard.

202825.text: So stubborn...I have no choice but to stop you with my own hands!

202826.text: So I'm not able to stop you after all...

202827.text: Whatever, you will soon know it's pointless!

202828.text: Maybe the grudge between you and the old hunter...

202829.text: Friend... maybe you are right, but we need proof, otherwise the young men at my command won't believe it.

202830.text: One day, you will join us.

202831.text: You will become a great Protector...

202832.text: Recently, soldiers started patrolling around the villages, and even the delicate flowers sense the unease... If the war is able to end sooner, more people will visit the garden.

202834.text: Is this the soul-reaping monster that the villagers talked about? This is my garden though. You are not welcome here.

202835.text: Naughty one, you will learn your lesson. Hehe.

202838.text: Ah, the wound on my belly... I can't wither here...

202839.text: It's bleeding. I can't fight like this...

202840.text: (Panting)... I should be safe here... My garden...

202843.text: Didn't expect a human would notice me in the darkness. Ah, the smell of blood... Human, are you injured?

202844.text: Not a step closer... You stink of an inhuman smell... Are you manipulating monsters in secret? I won't... let you ruin the flowers...

202845.text: Ah... fainted... Hello? Human, wake up.

202846.text: Agh, blood everywhere. Why is it like this? I came here for fun!

202847.text: A wound on the belly? Let me see... Ah, a deep cut. Bandage...

202848.text: There we go. Sorry. I had to rip off your clothes a bit... It feels flatter than mine... No, this is...

202849.text: Sorry for lifting your skirt. This is...

202851.text: Human, you are awake. Don't move. I just stopped the bleeding.

202852.text: Did you wrap it for me?

202853.text: Yes. You fainted. I dressed your wound. You should be grateful. I'm not this kind-hearted to a human usually.

202855.text: I'm Nocturna. Ella promised me to play together in Lunia, but she didn't show up! After a long wait, when I was about to leave, I saw you. Human, what are you looking for?

202856.text: There are no tooth marks here...

202858.text: No way! I am a noble vampire, shunning the inferior creatures. I don't feed on blood! Humans are always impudent like this!

202859.text: Sorry... Everyone says vampires suck human blood so I took you as the monster manipulator.

202860.text: I shall accept your apology. But you are odd with your dress like this. Is it a hobby of yours?

202862.text: Yes. I saw it when I was dressing your wound.

202864.text: Don't worry. I won't force you to spit it out. You must have your reasons. I have mine as well. Even Ella, my best friend, doesn't know it.

202866.text: Erm, Mortimer, where are you going next?

202868.text: Naughty creatures. They dare to interrupt our conversation.

202869.text: Mortimer, do you want me to walk you home?

202870.text: I don't have a home... My garden is occupied by monsters. I can't rid myself of them on my own. I want to go to the castle, to tell the Grand Duke that monsters are prowling here, hoping he will send troops and eliminate them.

202871.text: The castle where the Grand Duke of Lunia lives? Erm, I've never been there. Seems Ella won't show up anyway. I'll go with you to the castle.

202873.text: Foul beings. In the name of God, Eulalia will purge you.

202874.text: Princess Eulalia! Let's help her out!

202875.text: Slow down. Your wound hasn't recovered yet...

202877.text: Don't worry. Even vampires will not be discriminated against on this land.

202878.text: Monsters invaded the garden as well as the villages nearby. Princess, could you please ask the Grand Duke to send the troops and kill these monsters?

202879.text: Sorry. I have left the castle. My father doesn't heed my words any more... But I will not turn a blind eye to these monsters.

202880.text: My guards are fighting them in the wilds. I came here for recon, but got ambushed. I am worried about the guards. Will you join me and go to the wilds?

202881.text: Princess... This is my... This is my honor. We will escort you there!

202882.text: Hey! Don't make decisions for me!

202884.text: Princess... Pull yourself together. Monsters are coming.

202888.text: Princess. I can't make it... The monsters... are being manipulated... by that strange woman. She is reaping our souls...

202890.text: She headed to... the forest there...

202892.text: No need for that. He has fulfilled his mission. God has claimed his soul...

202894.text: The one behind all this should be in the forest. For my subjects of this land, I request your help...

202895.text: Ah, human. Why do you kneel?

202896.text: Your highness... Please get up. We will try our best.

202897.text: Thank you... That villain should not be far away. Let us catch up.

202899.text: Have you just made another decision for me... Human, wait up!

202901.text: Exactly... How dare a human question me like that... I am Goorveig, the very one leading this world into chaos...

202902.text: Enough of your nonsense. Why are you summoning monsters here?

202904.text: Huhu. What an impatient human. When monsters appear, humans will ally and fight. But what if the country has entered a civil war?

202905.text: People in this country have been torn by war. There's no way for them to spare any effort for an army against the monsters... How despicable...

202906.text: Hehe... The short-sighted humans will bring destruction upon themselves. Leaving these souls to the Underworld is such a waste. I am merely making good use of them...

202907.text: Is that the reason why you ruined my garden? Unforgivable...

202908.text: The aura... Hehe. No wonder the impudence. You're also a weirdo, dressing up like this...

202910.text: Waaaaa...Your highness, don't listen to her nonsense. For the safety of this land, we should not spare her!

202911.text: Hehe, how insolent. Bit by bit, I'll let you be my captive.

202912.text: Curses. Not enough souls. The contract has not been fulfilled...

202913.text: I can't fall here. For the ritual of resurrection, I need more souls...

202914.text: It's a fascinating adventure. Human, you have sated my curiosity. I'll go find Ella. Are you coming with me to Muntenia?

202915.text: My garden was ruined by monsters. I'm not in the mood...

202916.text: Mortimer, can you stay with Eulalia?

202918.text: People of this country have had rough of war. Your magic shall heal this land as blossom. My power is far from enough, but I will help bring the peace back to this land with all my forces.

202919.text: Eulalia dreams of a country where everyone is equal. Will you join Eulalia?

202920.text: Your highness... my humble work is nothing more than tending flowers. Unlike your...noble deeds...

202921.text: What are you talking about? I believe you will be the fragrant rose of this country.

202922.text: Your highness, I shall follow you to the end of this world...

202923.text: Erm, are these the so-called lovers among humans?

202925.text: Waaaaa... Vampire, stop! Aren't you leaving? Hurry up...

202926.text: Thanks for your help. You are not a Lunian, I suppose?

202927.text: Looks like my mission ends here.

202929.text: Silver-haired human, you are bound to become a great inheritor...

202930.text: Catch up. The power is yours to claim.

202931.text: You are...the inheritor...of the great...Lady Ereshkigal...

202932.text: For thousands of years, we've lost faith...lurking in the dark...

202939.text: What a huge guy. This will be a difficult fight.

202940.text: Stay alert. It has noticed us.

202941.text: Even without the order of the Protector, I will not look on with folded arms when seeing evil deeds.

202942.text: Phrygia, the Chevalier of Irminsul, will not allow you to harm the innocent.

202943.text: That ability of Ereshkigal, once again...

202944.text: Ah, great Gordia, I, your faithful follower, am here to offer souls to you. The humiliation that Akasha the Sword Maiden of Shooting Stars gave you will soon be cleansed.

202947.text: You give off the same aura of darkness. You should be like me, believing in the great Demongod.

202949.text: I can't fall here. No one can stop Gordia's great revival.

202953.text: It's too dangerous ahead. If you keep going and step into the maelstrom of miseries, you shall lose your life.

202955.text: Give up... She cannot be saved...

202958.text: Seems that after all, I cannot stop you.

202959.text: My master, perhaps this time, things will be different...

202961.text: It must be because of the crazy deeds of that preacher...Even that giant monster shows up...

202962.text: No. I can't put the master in danger...

202965.text: ...Huh? The elemental magic is nothing near the simple trick you just said. I would argue that alchemy is the lowest form of magic after all.

202966.text: Excuse me? Are you talking about the magic that alters the very existence of substance?!

202968.text: Where have you been the other day anyway? Pretended to be sick and practiced your tricks alone?

202969.text: Haven't we promised to learn together and see who's the smarter one when we grow up?

202970.text: Hahaha. You can't learn without me? Dejase the weeper.

202972.text: I just nodded off a little while and there was a dream. Slacked too much these days...

202973.text: ... The investigation has lasted three days. Still not a clue. How can I get into that tower?

202974.text: Damn...So close, yet so far away.

202975.text: Fidgeting doesn't help. I need to change my mood.

202976.text: It's been days since I practiced combat spells. Sorry little bats, consider it a biological research.

202977.text: Glad I'm not returning empty-handed. I can bring this back for analysis.

202979.text: Was... that alchemy? Are you an alchemist? May I know your name?

202980.text: I am an alchemist. How can I help you?

202981.text: Sorry, I should have introduced myself first. Bluen Agilolfing, at your service. I am gathering a party to enter the Chrono Tower.

202982.text: Chrono Tower? Have you found the way to open that door?

202983.text: Not yet. Besides, I don't have any company yet... But with the help from a reliable one like you, we will soon get ourselves in the tower.

202984.text: I'm sorry. This may be abrupt... but would you like to join me? If it is the payment you seek, I will offer my best.

202985.text: Hehe, payment? You sound like a noble mistress. Your words always sound so nice and easy.

202986.text: In the name of House Agilolfing, I swear I will honor my words...

202987.text: In the name of? An agreement is not a spell. Why would you believe in such childish plays?

202988.text: I'm not interested in your noble affairs. I'm leaving if there's nothing else you need me for. Bye.

202989.text: You also seek to enter the Chrono Tower, don't you? If you would change your mind, do come to me anytime!

202991.text: (I didn't realize that so many people had fixed their eyes on this place.)

202992.text: I've collected enough samples. Time to go back to analyze.

202994.text: Miss... I... I'm a good girl!

202995.text: Huh? Where did you come from? With that strange head-wear of yours?

202996.text: Did you have too much fun here and get lost? Where are you going?

202998.text: Where am I going? Erm... The Chrono Tower!

202999.text: What's wrong with me today? I'm like a magnet for strange people, all targeting at the Chrono Tower.

203000.text: Listen. Don't waste your time joking with me. Get back to where you've come from. You can find your home, right?

203002.text: I have been delayed for too long. I need to head back home now.

203004.text: Forget it. I need to focus on my own business.

203006.text: Damn, my bottle! All the samples…

203008.text: Not you again. Am I cursed today?

203009.text: I told you to go back home! Don't you know it's dangerous here at night?

203010.text: But I'm lost for real. I wanna go to the Chrono Tower.

203011.text: Horrific lady, could you please take me there?

203012.text: The Chrono Tower, right? I just met with a kind girl who wishes to go there.

203014.text: I'll bring you there. What's your name?

203016.text: (Hope these two can get along and have fun for themselves. Just leave me be.)

203018.text: Still can't do this on my own? I've been working so hard. Why...

203019.text: I need to get up. I can still fight. Ha...

203022.text: Ah, I've had enough. It's really a tough journey!

203023.text: Thanks for your help... Ah, you're the one I met earlier...

203024.text: Your wound doesn't look too serious. I have some spare potions. Take them.

203025.text: You have returned to me. Have you changed your mind?

203028.text: Mister, you have had enough materials already. Why do we still need to look for monsters?

203030.text: Hold on. Did you just cast magic? You didn't wield a wand or chant spells. Who on earth are you?

203031.text: Seems like that your brain doesn't work better than mine. Got lost as usual and couldn't count well either. Haha!

203034.text: Get up. Are you wounded? Ah, this is...

203036.text: I'm Ella. Miss, this lady told me to go to the Chrono Tower with you!

203041.text: You can't fool me. How can an ordinary person wield such powerful magic?

203043.text: (Sob)... I am not from here. I come from Muntenia...
