203044.text: My tail... I am a dragonoid. I'll be laughed at if I reveal my tail here.

203045.text: The kid's magic... only one year?

203046.text: I came here to play, not for mischief...(Sob)...

203047.text: Enough! You might find delight in mocking us, but we don't consider your jokes interesting!

203048.text: Huh? It's just a common magic, an introductive spell for kids.

203049.text: It's impossible that a Muntenian can't master a spell like this unless being sick.

203050.text: I've learned from books that humans can only live for decades...

203052.text: That's enough. As the strong one, just enjoy your privilege but never meddle in my affairs.

203053.text: Sure! Then, we learn the summoning magic in the second year. In the third year...

203054.text: Anyway, you've come back to join me, right? We indeed share the same perspective.

203055.text: Sorry... I didn't know you would be mad about this...

203056.text: It's splendid to have you on board. I believe we can find a way to the Tower in very soon.

203057.text: Apologies for not catching your name sooner. How may I address you?

203058.text: (Well, my mind will not be at ease if I leave them like this.)

203060.text: I've been investigating this place for days. The clue is likely on the monster that attacked you.

203061.text: The powder left by the monster. May I take a look?

203063.text: I'm a preacher of the Holy Church, in charge of the safety of the Chrono Tower. Can I take a look at the thing in your hand?

203064.text: The Holy Church? When did it become so responsible for everything?

203065.text: We do have what you want. Be honest with me and I'll show it to you.

203066.text: Ah, sorry. My name is Fellagood, a serving preacher of the Holy Church.

203067.text: The Church is also investigating the Chrono Tower, and has disenchanted the spell that sealed it.

203068.text: Ah, we may be on the same path. Why don't we cooperate?

203069.text: Although the spell has been disenchanted, we still need a "key". To make it, we need the extraction from the thing in your hand.

203070.text: Compared with magic, we prefer something more interesting! Don't you agree, miss?

203072.text: Dejase, we don't have any clues now. Why don't we collect the things he needs first? We will see what he's up to afterward.

203073.text: All right. But I'll only give it to you when you're about to open the door.

203074.text: Hahaha, sure. It's fair you don't trust me.

203075.text: The Holy Church won't take your effort for naught. We share the same goal.

203076.text: Let's work this out together, then.

203077.text: With all due respect, why is the Holy Church suddenly investigating the Chrono Tower?

203078.text: Rumors are everywhere, saying an ancient power in the tower is awakening.

203079.text: Ah, you mean the Chrono Tower? Commoners treat it as an ancient ruin that has always been there.

203080.text: The heretics of the Neo Church even doubt its divinity.

203081.text: But only the Holy Church understands it: God and God's power, they have always been there, since the very beginning.

203082.text: As the children of God, shouldn't we awaken it from the slumber and embrace its advent?

203083.text: Aren't you here for the truth as well?

203085.text: We can make the "key" very soon.

203086.text: It's getting late, we should head back to the camp.

203087.text: Don't follow us all the time, you.

203088.text: Sure. Have a good night. I shall take my leave.

203092.text: Are you all right? What happened?

203094.text: You've changed a lot. You're no longer the Anemone I knew!

203098.text: You came so early. What's the rush?

203099.text: Ah, I came here just to tell you that I found a place infested with active monsters...

203100.text: The girl over there, could you join me in the investigation?

203102.text: What are you up to? I'm coming with you as well, since there are monsters.

203103.text: Hahaha. Good. Please allow me to take the lead then.

203104.text: Are you sure we are heading in the right direction?

203105.text: You still don't trust me, it seems.

203106.text: Look, the monsters there are all that we haven't met before.

203107.text: ...Let's head back right after finishing the collecting. The magic here is way more concentrated than before.

203109.text: There's another one. Take it down as well.

203110.text: Watch your tongue. That's not how you should speak.

203111.text: Damn. We've attracted too many monsters.

203113.text: Alchemist, we are heading back to the camp first. Could you please drive them away?

203115.text: The lady is amazing and kind!

203116.text: Hehe. Little girl... Perhaps I shouldn't call you like this?

203117.text: Your magic is no ordinary one. Are you a dragonoid of Muntenia?

203118.text: I don't remember there being such a race.

203119.text: Yeeees. We'll go to the Chrono Tower!

203121.text: Why the Chrono Tower? The Holy Church won't tolerate any act of blasphemy.

203123.text: I'm here to awaken... erm... the power of the Protector!

203125.text: Are you talking about the Protector of Chilora? The one who...

203126.text: Wait. The road is different from that we came.

203130.text: Uhmm. Actually, I am the guardian dragon of the Chrono Tower.

203135.text: Mr. Preacher doesn't have a good sense of direction. We seem to have been going the opposite way.

203136.text: Is that so? Fine, as long as you are in one piece, it doesn't matter.

203137.text: Let's go back. The monsters are gone.

203138.text: Miss, you are not horrific as you look. You're nice!

203139.text: You give others your trust with such haste. This might ruin you.

203140.text: I'm so happy that I have made new friends. When I go back home, I'll tell others about this.

203141.text: Did I acknowledge you as my friend, suspicious little girl?

203142.text: Only children believe in so-called friends.

203143.text: Friendship is based on mutual interests, otherwise it's just empty talk.

203144.text: "... She has become ill-tempered, but still my only friend."

203145.text: "I made this year's birthday cake with alchemy. What will be her reaction..."

203147.text: "... It's been three years. How can a person vanish into air?"

203149.text: "... Five years have passed. I guess I understand why she did it."

203150.text: "In this world, nobody would listen to the words of the weak..."

203152.text: Alas, the gate of the Chrono Tower will finally be opened.

203154.text: My sincere appreciation for your effort. Now time to bid farewell.

203156.text: I should have unveiled your scheme sooner, hypocrite.

203158.text: ...How unwise of you. You could've been killed by monsters and save me the effort...

203159.text: I don't want to waste my tool's energy on you, should it be possible...

203165.text: Your alchemy has proved its worth. Join me in obedience to God. Astray no longer.

203168.text: Oh, it seems she doesn't remember you any more.

203169.text: Or should I say she's a stranger to you already.

203170.text: The unknown power and the secrets that lie behind the overlapping Chronospaces... don't they arouse your curiosity?

203176.text: What the hell is this? Protect me, now!

203181.text: I've been around all the time. Nocturna sent me.

203182.text: Why didn't you show up earlier?

203183.text: Because each night before, you had slept early so I couldn't talk to you.

203186.text: Sorry. Feelings and memories are intertwined. If the memories are removed, so are the feelings.

203188.text: Hey... Don't be sad. Here's your birthday present.

203190.text: Humans in this area have rich feelings, which can form into beautiful gems.

203192.text: Hmm...Intended to find yourself a gift in Chrono Tower. It's typical of you.

203193.text: Ah... My head hurts... Did I sleep for a long time?

203194.text: I don't know either. All I can remember is we opened the door somehow.

203196.text: The door's open. Let's get in then.

203197.text: That is... a creature we've never seen. Looks like a work of magic.

203198.text: Maybe we can find clues about the Chrono Tower from the monsters nearby.

203199.text: You've all got a few tricks up your sleeves.

203201.text: Ah... This is not my voice. This is...

203202.text: Sometimes, the answer is more disturbing than the question.

203204.text: Have you found the statue that Wraithscythe talked about?

203206.text: I must be blind for missing it so many times.

203207.text: Terrific. Hope I can stop Goorveig in time.

203210.text: Time's running out. If Gordia is revived, he'll put the whole world in disaster!

203212.text: Unbelievable... You stopped the rite of the Demongod's resurrection.

203213.text: I didn't expect... you have such power.

203216.text: We deliverers can be intangible by transforming ourselves into the form of spirits, which means common magics can't trap us.

203217.text: Goorveig won't give up that easily. I bet she's still planning on reviving Gordia.

203218.text: Is there any way I can get her?

203219.text: We will have to get her...

203220.text: Don't worry. I have a plan. This is a Spirit Catcher, an item made by Acheronte for catching spirits.

203221.text: Should you see Goorveig again, cast it out.

203222.text: Once you have Goorveig under control, I'll be informed and come to you.

203223.text: Remember, we can't let her go again.

203224.text: Sometimes, the answer is more disturbing than the question.

203226.text: If you believe it is worth following, you will reaffirm your faith. Faith will become the strength that supports you. Humans are like this. So are the Protectors.

203228.text: There's a better chance to seek the source of the Geothermy underground.

203229.text: The closer you get to the darkness, the stronger its attraction is. You might even submit to it.

203232.text: Cassiel's monsters can't just be appearing out of thin air, maybe someone's controlling them.

203234.text: Conflicts and people are inseparable. Hierarchy only makes it worse.

203235.text: Ah... misses... sorry... Ella will remember you...

203236.text: Monsters will pile up if left untended. Slay them, and avoid being surrounded.

203237.text: It seems there's an assassination skill that bounds the target. Once targeted, you'll receive a fatal strike.

203238.text: Pay attention to Giant Monster's different forms when fighting against it.

203239.text: Some monsters burst out magical light beams from their eyes. Try to disrupt it with Control Magic. It works even better than you think.

203240.text: Some monsters have immense bodies that can make the ground tremble. Avoid being hit directly.

203241.text: Why not clean out the bats and liven the place up a bit?

203242.text: The little girl... I can't leave the monsters be...

203243.text: To get into the Chrono Tower, it's necessary to collect materials.

203246.text: Despicable! It's one of Acheronte's magic items. Who gave it to you?

203249.text: Goorveig, you broke the Deliverer's oath. I will bring you back to Acheronte.

203250.text: Haha... You think you can prevent Gordia's revival by catching me?

203251.text: We will get what we want. How can you stop Gordia's resurrection? Haha...

203252.text: Stubborn, aren't you? I will stop you. Even if Gordia walks in this world again, we will eliminate him as many times as needed. Akasha will help us.

203253.text: Hehe... Fool. You can't stop us...

203254.text: Thanks for your help. I'll bring her back. See you.

203256.text: Under the influence of Metamorphoses, it may be destiny or coincidence.

203257.text: Dejase's memory of her only friend used to be hard to get over but now is unexpectedly sealed in the depths of her mind.

203258.text: Maybe there'll be a day when her feelings are aroused. Maybe never.

203259.text: What's left is just a sigh lingering across the Chronospace.

203261.text: The concentration of magic is surprisingly high as well. The people here will...

203262.text: No, I must not let anyone here get hurt...

203264.text: A chevalier without magic, huh? What are you doing here?

203265.text: Flare, I know this is your hometown, so I thought I might be able to meet you here...

203266.text: So you hid and spied on me?

203267.text: No, I didn't... I just wanted to ask about Protector Asherah.

203269.text: Yes, as you know, this land has suffered from Magical Abnormality. Only Protector Asherah can save this land, but why won't he see me...

203270.text: Apparently the Protector isn't interested in talking to people like you, and neither am I.

203271.text: But we used to talk about everything! Back then, I swore to guard Asherah with you, escorting her on her rounds and receiving her people...

203272.text: It's all in the past, do you really think you can talk with the Protector with you like this?!

203274.text: Be clear about your own place here, the Protector won't see a chevalier who can't do magic like you!

203275.text: Flare, you were not like this before. In the past we followed Asherah together and helped those in need...

203276.text: What's the point in talking about the past?!

203277.text: It can't be... Protector Asherah sheltered the people of this land, and you, like me, swore to protect Asheray. At that time, Irminsul was...

203278.text: I just can't believe the tender Asherah could choose to turn away from her people, from this land...

203279.text: And you say that you are still loyal to the Protector. Pfft, chevalier without magic, I already knew you were not trustworthy and now you even doubt the Protector. How dare you!

203280.text: Flare, please, help me. Come with me to persuade Asherah!

203281.text: You have betrayed your oath. Who are you to see the Protector? Don't come to me again, or I will show you the power of magic.

203282.text: Flare, this will not solve any problems... As a Chevalier of Irminsul, I will not give up and will guard this land no matter what.

203283.text: Why is this happening? Is there no other way out?...

203284.text: Flare, why is it that even you...

203285.text: The key to solving the riddle is nearby.

203286.text: Exploring nearby will naturally pay off.

203287.text: It's extremely important to collect magic.

203289.text: Magic? A swordswoman will not retreat in the face of any danger. If you are afraid, you'd better go home quickly.

203290.text:
How anxious of you, huh... The Witch will feel at ease like I do with such a reliable swordswoman by our side. 
However, this is a strange place, and it is dangerous to lose your way. Be careful!

203291.text: How did a Witch's soul servant manage to leave her master and run away? Don't waste your time here!

203292.text: That super strong girl was right, entrusting her to build better equipment will definitely be of great help to the adventure.

203293.text: Strange... I can't feel the magic of that big guy...

203294.text: What a strange facility... It should be further investigated.

203296.text: Isn't it just an ordinary shard?

203297.text: The shard contains no ordinary magic power, and there should be more than one of these shards. We might be able to figure out what's behind it if we can put all the pieces together.

203298.text: Is it a spell? The door is locked tightly.

203302.text: Croche, don't act like you're the one who deserves sympathy here! You are all to blame for our current situation!

203303.text: That's right, you're the one who defected to the devil and brought us all this.

203307.text: (Whispering) Why bother with those stupid humans. Just use my power, in one simple move...

203308.text: I don't need your power! Don't... don't come out again...

203309.text: (Whispering) How ungrateful. Without my power, you'd be just as ugly as they are! Shouldn't you do as I say?

203310.text: I don't want to hurt people, nor do I want to use your power...

203311.text: (Whispering) If you don't release the magic as I tell you, your body will suffer inconceivable pain. Haha...

203312.text: (Whispering) Think about it carefully, the pain will be unbearable.

203313.text: I won't do what you want, so don't come out again.

203314.text: Wow, what a nasty feeling! Why do the plants around give off this kind of magic?

203315.text: Is it true that these plants are responsible for this concentration of magic?

203318.text: It must have been a very busy street in the past, I can't believe it has now fallen so far into this state.

203319.text: Is this the feeling of sorrow?

203320.text: Please don't... The demon, the demon is coming...

203321.text: (Whispering) Little girl, I am running out of my patience to pursuade you into casting magic. Soon the casting will be not up to you. It's not easy for me to possess a human so I shall not let this chance pass by.

203322.text: (Whispering) So close, soon I'll be unleashed! Haha!

203323.text:
(Whispering) How is it possible that a human can stop me? No, I will not be sealed!
I'm not leaving this world. Ah...

203325.text: The evil aura has gone and she seems to be back to normal.

203326.text: Thank you, if it wasn't for you, I would have been consumed by this ominous magic.

203327.text: What was the magic just now?

203328.text: Are you back to normal now?

203329.text: I almost lost control of my body to that demon a moment ago, but I'm now back to normal. Since you saved my life, I'll tell you everything.

203330.text: The magical energy emanates from the demon inside me. He held the delusion that he can unleash himself by using the seal atop the bell tower and then rule the world.

203331.text: Before, when the Magical Abnormality occurred, I was ringing the bell at the top of the bell tower and was also cursed by the calamitous magic. My desire to live made me unable to resist the temptation of the demon and so he possessed me.

203332.text: The demon's magic is far more powerful than the magic curse, this allowed me to not be harmed by the curse.

203334.text: Yes, he has been trying to take control of my body and lift his seal. Without you, I couldn't even imagine what would have happened.

203335.text: But the demon is not going to give up so easily, I'd better stay away from people.

203337.text: Don't worry, we use this bandage to seal heretics in the abbey, it's powerful enough to suppress the demon's magic. I can maintain the seal as long as I wrap it tightly around my body. I won’t give the demon any chance to escape and commit evil.

203338.text: Thank you for saving me. Farewell, I doubt we'll meet again.

203339.text: Although it has fallen into dilapidation, you can still feel the prosperity of its past. There must be prosperous towns in your homeland too.

203341.text:
My bad, I forgot you lost all your memories. But don't worry, you're not alone. We're all friends. 
Don't dwell on the sad things, let's keep moving.

203343.text: How did Irminsul become so full of ominous magical aura... What really happened here?...

203344.text: Maybe Flare knows what's going on, let's quickly go and confirm everything with her.

203345.text: It's been a long time, Ms. Flare!

203346.text: Oh, Yui! Didn't you go back to Fomoire already?

203347.text: Earlier, an unknown magical force hit the barrier of Fomoire and almost destroyed it. But the Six Ovates worked together to repair the barrier, allowing everyone in Fomoire to be kept safe.

203348.text: Master Norn asked me to come here first to check this place, and it turned out that the place was occupied by magical creatures.

203349.text: Magical creatures? Did you hurt them, then?

203350.text: Those monsters attacked me, so I had to dispel them!

203351.text: How dare you hurt the people here!

203352.text: The people here? What are you talking about? Those are the monsters that attacked me.

203353.text: You might have also noticed the concentration of magic around here. This abnormal...

203354.text: No need for you to meddle. You'd better go back to Fomoire, don't return here to hurt my people again!

203355.text: What exactly are you talking about... Ms. Flare, are those... tentacles on your head?

203357.text: Don't ask, it's none of your business! Go back to Fomoire quickly, and if I see you hurting anyone here again, I won't show you any mercy!

203358.text: How very strange... Why would Ms. Flare...

203359.text: Maybe I have to look around and see what's going on with Irminsul.

203361.text: There are two roads here, which way should we go?

203362.text: Just rely on your intuition at times like this.

203363.text: What? That's unhelpful, which one do you think we should take?

203365.text: You're a witch, so use your crystal orb to find the right one.

203366.text: I don't think that's what witches really do...

203367.text: Irminsul was so prosperous, why is it completely empty now? Where did everyone go...

203369.text: Great, we've finally met a person...

203372.text: Ah, I'm sorry, that must have sounded strange. I'm Yui of the Sixth Ovates from Fomoire, could you please tell me what's going on here?

203373.text: The people of Irminsul have been turned into magical creatures... No wonder Ms. Flare turned the way she did. It really must be hard for her to accept this.

203374.text: Thank you for giving me so many clues. But unfortunately, I lack the knowledge to decipher the conjuring... not to mention that not even Ms. Flare can break it.

203375.text: Wait. Master Norn has lived for a real long time. Maybe he knows the way to undo the curse and turn everyone back to normal.

203377.text: A way to undo the curse?

203378.text: Yes, Master Norn is the head of the Six Ovates. She has mastered all kinds of conjurings, so she might be able to undo this one if she's here. We must report what happened here to her as soon as possible without any further delay.

203379.text: There's a crazy aura coming from around here. Have they lost their minds from being controlled by magic?

203381.text: Never mind, Yothaya is just passing by.

203382.text: Oh, Yothaya... Could it be that you're one of the Six Ovates of Fomoire Island?...

203383.text: Huh? How do you know my name?

203384.text: I had the pleasure of going to a concert in Fomoire and had heard of the names of the Six Ovates there.

203385.text: I see... Yothaya just escaped from the sacrificial altar, but there seems to be nothing interesting around here. The magic in your body has returned to normal, you should get some rest.

203386.text: It hurts. My head hurts... Please, help me...

203389.text: Why are all the plants here abnormal? Ah, even the flowers are wilted!

203390.text: This ominous aura... It seems that what happened to Irminsul has something to do with the magic that attacked Fomoire before.

203391.text: I must hurry back to Fomoire and tell Master Norn what happened here.

203392.text: There seems to be an island to the south.

203393.text: Where?... Ah, over there. Let's go check it out.

203395.text: Master Norn, something's wrong. Magical Abnormality occurred in Irminsul.

203396.text: Ah, it's you, Yui. Take your time, I'm listening.

203398.text: Master Norn, we've got a problem!

203399.text: Sigh, here comes something even more urgent...

203400.text: Yothaya, what's the matter? I'm listening. Slow down...

203402.text: Magic curse...? However, without seeing it closely, it is difficult for me to determine what it is exactly. It would be good to get more detailed information.

203406.text: The magic that leaked from the depths of the forest turned everyone into magical creatures... But there was never a forest in Irminsul.

203407.text: It seems that things are more serious than I expected. Yui, go and inform the other Ovates and tell them to keep vigilant around Fomoire. I'm going to Irminsul myself to see what's going on.

203408.text: The plants around here absorb strange magic, making them grow like crazy. As long as we explore the source of this magic, we can find the cause of the mutation.

203409.text: Magic is leaking from the depths of the forest, if we follow the trail of magic leakage we will be able to find the root cause of the calamity. The people here are still suffering, I can't waste any more time here.

203410.text: This unusual magic... It feels so familiar.

203412.text: Right! It's like that butterfly before!

203413.text: Butterfly? I don't think I remember seeing one...

203415.text: Yes, the one who became a butterfly!

203416.text: There seems to be a small island in front, there's got to be a way to get to it.

203417.text: But there is no road nearby...

203418.text: Trust me, I have great eyesight. The island is to the south, go check it now.

203419.text: It's you, are you also tracking the source of the magic?

203421.text: Tell her about the Ruin of the Giant Tree.

203422.text: So, the root of everything is the Protector?

203423.text: I was also tracing the source of the magic, and all clues pointed to the ruin deep in the forest. The concentration of magic is too high, and the spell of the curse is so complex that even I cannot lift the curse from anyone in a short time.

203424.text: But, as an Ovate, I will do my best and will work with the other Ovates to turn everyone back to normal.

203425.text: The magic around here is getting much thicker, be sure to be careful.

203427.text: Wait a minute, I used to be a Glorious Chevalier loyal to the Protector. I'm not evil, I just became like this from the magic curse.

203428.text: So... what do you want from us?

203429.text: I'm sure you know that there was a calamity in Irminsul, and everyone turned into strange creatures, but then how about you?...

203430.text: I... well... sorry, no, I know nothing!

203431.text: I'm investigating the cause of the calamity as a Glorious Chevalier, so...

203434.text: Girl, are you okay? Have you been possessed?

203435.text: Don't be afraid, let me help you!

203436.text: Such strong magic, does it have anything to do with the magical calamity?...

203437.text: I have to find out. I have to catch up quickly... Quack.

203438.text: There is still a road here, huh?

203439.text: The last time I passed here I didn't even notice it...

203440.text: It seems that there are still many secrets hidden in this tower, how very exciting!

203441.text: That person we just saw seemed to have a deep faith.

203442.text: Laksha seems to have stayed in the tower all the time.

203444.text: Everywhere is in shambles, what a bummer.

203445.text: Is there really an elixir that can keep me young forever? I can't believe I have to suffer so much in order to maintain my beauty!

203447.text: It seems someone has been staring at me...

203448.text: Huh? But there's no one around, it must be an illusion, right?

203449.text: An illusion? But I felt such a strong stare in my direction...

203450.text: What's that noise about? We can even hear it from here.

203451.text: Are people arguing up ahead? It seems like they are talking about some evil person or something.

203453.text: Don't say such things, if you're not careful, something might really happen and you’ll regret saying that.

203454.text: Listen, there seems to be people arguing up ahead.

203455.text: That voice is... the voice from that girl before!

203457.text: Hey, girl over there! I have something to ask you.

203458.text: Huh? Girl? Anemone is not a child!

203459.text: What's with the attitude? You should feel honored to speak to me, Ruda, the Starlight Collector.

203460.text: You stinker, what are you talking about!

203461.text: Such a rude girl, didn't you ever learn manners?

203462.text: All mortals should kneel before me and answer my questions.

203463.text: I heard that there is an elixir of eternal youth in this tower, girl, have you heard about it at all?

203464.text: Not only are you ignoring Anemone's words, but you're also treating Anemone like a fool.

203465.text: I've had enough, I won't tell you anything! Even if I do know!

203466.text: Have I really been deceived by those mercenaries?

203467.text: The tower is so lofty that it is too impractical to search floor by floor. Ah, do I really have to accept this kind of trial to keep my beauty?

203469.text: Ah, I can't stand it anymore, only plebs would come to such a hellhole... What am I doing here?...

203470.text: Eww... My new shoes and clothes are all dirty.

203471.text: Well... I did not expect that after entering the tower, there’s no way to leave.

203472.text: Hey, you there. Do you know the way out?

203474.text: Hey, do you know the way out?

203477.text: Such an uncouth fellow, looks like I'll have to do it myself then. What are you still doing here? Go find a way to get out of the tower!

203480.text: Quickly, go back! $heroine$'s lips are all blue...

203481.text: I didn't expect it to be so cold, but luckily I've got a leather coat.

203482.text: Can we please just go back...

203483.text: Stop complaining, we have to get to the top of the mountain...

203484.text: The man in front seems to be digging something, should we go and take a look?

203485.text: Little girl, don't go any further! There's an avalanche ahead. It's dangerous.

203487.text: You're actually fluttering in the air! You've got... wings behind your back!

203488.text: Who on earth are you? Are you one of those horsemen?

203489.text: I am merely being silent, it is you who is speaking impertinently.

203490.text: There is a price to pay for belittling me!

203491.text: Hmph, do not try to provoke me. The greatest mage always comes with horror.

203493.text: The two turned into ice sculptures in an instant, that's truly terrible frost magic.

203494.text: Could this endless blizzard have anything to do with her?...

203495.text: Can anyone really cast magic on that scale?

203496.text: We'd better catch up, she probably has the clue.

203497.text: You've been following me. What do you want?

203498.text: Tell me now or I will show thee the horror of magic.

203499.text: Ask her about her relationship with the blizzard.

203500.text: Suspect her of manipulating the blizzard.

203501.text: Well, are you also aware of my magic's greatness?

203502.text: I am the Frost Witch Pakane, with my magic, I can plunge the world into an ice age with a mere flick of the wrist.

203503.text: Ah, it's too late. Lilia is still waiting for me.

203504.text: Get out of my way right now.

203530.text: I feel so dizzy... This starry sky seems so unfamiliar to me, doesn't it?

203531.text: A big mirror floated in the starry sky, emitting an eerie black aura.

203532.text: The young girl sat up slowly.

203534.text: The girl was recalling the process of coming here, but suddenly, an inaudible voice came into her head.

203535.text: After hearing the voice, the girl walked to the mirror as if she had been hypnotized.

203536.text: Yes, that's it. Let me have a good look!

203537.text: The mirror showed a picture of a girl in purple being eaten by monsters as she tried to protect the girl in red behind her with her body. The girl in red was tied to a stone pillar as a monster beneath her feet climbed it up

203539.text: At this time, the vague voice in her head came again instantly making her come back to her senses.

203540.text: What was that? Oh no, monsters!

203541.text: Go save them. Isn't that what you love doing?

203542.text: The young girl stepped into the mirror resolutely.

203544.text: After entering the world in the mirror, the girl felt that the world was longing for everything she had.

203546.text: As the girl resisted the lust of the world, the magic next to the girl in purple became more ferocious.

203547.text: She had to use her body to stop the advance of the monsters.

203548.text: Forget it... I won't let you advance...

203549.text: When the girl saw this, she immediately repelled the monsters and stood in front of the girl in purple.

203551.text: That's right! Help her! I didn't expect to be able to summon such a superb masterpiece.

203554.text: She picked up the girl in purple's body and shook it gently. Slowly, she opened her eyes.

203556.text: Great! Where are we? What's going on?

203558.text: The girl in purple raised her hand with great difficulty and opened her mouth slightly, but could not make any sound. When the other girl saw this, she gently put her down and got up to rescue the girl in red.

203559.text: A huge cloud of black gas suddenly started escaping from the girl in purple's body. The girl immediately went to check it.

203560.text: The black gas seems to come from a hole in her back, it doesn't look like it was caused by monsters. Could it be...

203561.text: You're quite perceptive, as expected of the witch, but it doesn't matter how perceptive you are.

203562.text: Before the witch could take a closer look, the girl in purple's body slowly dissipated. At that moment, the monsters at the feet of the girl in red gathered again.

203563.text: Just as the girl rushed forward to repel the monsters, she bumped into a transparent barrier.

203564.text: Ouch, my nose hurts... In that case, let's try this magic arrow!

203565.text: No matter how the girl struck the barrier it did not do a thing, leaving the girl dejected.

203566.text: Well, of course you can't break it here! I just wanted to see that look of not being consigned to fate on your face.

203567.text: If you want to save her so much, I'll let you go!

203568.text: At this time, the transparent barrier suddenly burst out dazzling white light, bouncing the girl out of the mirror world.

203569.text: After a while, the girl's vision was restored and she found herself back in the space where she'd started. A light shot from the first mirror deep into the starry sky and a second mirror slowly emerged.

203571.text: Once again, the remote voice came into her head.

203572.text: Go! Show me how you're going to save her.

203574.text: The girl stood in front of the mirror again, and a second image appeared.

203575.text: The girl in purple and the monsters had disappeared in this picture, while the girl in red was still there, unchanged.

203576.text: If someone disappears from the mirror, it means they have been saved. If someone is shown in the mirror, it means they have been imprisoned.

203577.text: Well then, there is only one thing left to do.

203578.text: The girl clenched the staff in her hand and entered the mirror again.

203579.text: Endless energy converge in this world, plunging into the girl's body, eager to become part of her.

203580.text: The huge energy that instantly surged into her body caused the girl to stagger. She slowly stood up and walked towards the girl in red with difficulty.

203581.text: Have you already had enough? Don't you usually like to absorb other people's energy?

203582.text: Absorb it! Absorb more! It will be even more delicious!

203583.text: The closer she got to the girl in red, the faster the energy rushed into her. The young girl suddenly realized that she could cast magic as she advanced..

203584.text: Haha, congratulations to our witch for finally coming up with the right solution.

203585.text: The girl finally walked under the stone pillar, but the stone pillar and the girl in red turned into masked monsters.

203587.text: Laughs of ruthless mockery reverberated in the world, but also in the heart of the girl.

203590.text: The figure of the girl in red appeared in the distance in the completely opposite direction as the girl sprinted over to her.

203591.text: It's already too late! Unless our witch going to perform a miracle, is she?

203593.text: Haha, I've played enough now. I'll let it play with you next!

203594.text: The masked monsters disappeared into black gas. Then, a huge black shadow came towards the girl.

203595.text: Luckily there is endless energy here. Take this!

203596.text: She darted under the stone pillar to break the chains and held the girl in red in her arms.

203597.text: But black gas emanated from the girl in red's body once more and the faces of countless monsters emerged from the black gas.

203600.text: How upsetting, you were tricked again.

203601.text: This is the price of your naivety!

203602.text: But this time I'll play a little joke on you, haha!

203604.text: The girl frantically cast magic in an attempt to attack the monsters, but to no avail.

203605.text: Were you really happy when you first saved her? You're always so self-righteous.

203606.text: Grieve! Seethe! These will all become my food.

203607.text: However, as the black gas dissipated, the appearance of the girl in red changed.

203609.text: These are... a dragon's horns and tail?

203611.text: But before the words had even finished being spoken, the figure of the girl in red completely disappeared.

203612.text: The girl got a bit agitated after not being able to save the girl in red after getting so close again.

203613.text: Isn't there anything in this place that does not come from black gas?

203615.text: Looking at the third mirror in front of her, the girl kicked the mirror as hard as she could, but the mirror didn't budge.

203616.text: It's just a stupid mirror. I'll smash it from the outside! My magic arrows are not just pretty but powerful too!

203618.text: Mirror... show me your crack.. Why are you still intact?

203619.text: Sorry, the magic arrows must just be pretty, not powerful. Haha!

203620.text: The frustrated girl had to stand in front of the mirror again and look at the third image.

203621.text: In it, countless dancing marionettes surrounded a girl in red controlled by strings.

203622.text: She was luring a young boy toward a black mass of gas behind her.

203624.text: The young girl took a deep breath and tried to stop what was happening in front of her by rushing into the mirror impulsively.

203625.text: Are you still trying this? Have you forgotten how it turned out last time?

203626.text: The girl rushed into the mirror, but could not find the black gas anywhere. All she could see were many marionettes controlled by strings.

203627.text: The marionettes saw the appearance of the girl and let out an even stronger wail.

203628.text: Help us! I don't want to dance anymore!

203629.text: Please! Cut the string behind us. We can't feel our hands or feet!

203630.text: The girl could no longer restrain her anger.

203631.text: Black gas, show yourself! Do you not value life at all?

203632.text: Good. How about you, then? Do you value lives? What is the whole world to you?

203633.text: The girl waved her staff angrily, trying to find the culprit.

203634.text: Magic arrow! Magic arrow! Magic arrow! If I don't hurry up, there is no hope for that child!

203635.text: Unfortunately, that little boy of yours is about to take his last breath.

203636.text: Coming up... It's her turn. I can't wait to see your reaction!

203637.text: A warm and familiar voice suddenly sounded in the girl's head.

203638.text: My child, you have worked very hard and can stop now.

203639.text: No one will blame you, come into my arms and get some rest!

203640.text: The girl who heard the voice could not help but stop and indulge in it.

203641.text: Hearing the echo of the voice, the girl unwittingly shed tears.

203642.text: Oh warmth, false dreams are always so fascinating.

203643.text: The more you indulge in it, the more you will be manipulated by it. In the end, no one will care about the truth.

203644.text: Here you are, sleeping, with a contented smile...

203646.text: Just when half of the girl's feet had been swallowed by the black gas, a blaring dragon roar suddenly resounded in this world, making the girl instantly wake up.

203648.text: The girl dispelled the black gas from her body and attacked the monsters in front of her.

203649.text: All the marionettes stopped moving, but the familiar barrier did not appear.

203650.text: The girl felt a little strange, but she felt that should check on the two girls first.

203652.text: What exactly is the origin of this mysterious little dragon girl? How exactly did she regain her own lucidness when she was obviously completely controlled?

203653.text: And right at this point, something suddenly went wrong!

203654.text: The girl cut off the girl in red's strings and picked her up just as the familiar black gas reappeared.

203655.text: Huh? I thought all I had to do was cut the string, isn't that it?

203656.text: How many times do you have to fail?

203657.text: This is how you save others? Save yourself first!

203659.text: The silence of the girl contrasted with the mockery of the monsters.

203660.text: Just then, a voice suddenly came from behind the girl.

203664.text: The little boy's voice lit up the girl like a ray breaking dawn.

203665.text: When the blackness clears, the dawn is sure to come.

203669.text: Upon returning back to where she had been, the girl noticed the girl in red in front of the mirror.

203670.text: After some exchange, it turned out that the girl in red's name was Ella, from Muntenia. She had made plans with friends Metamorphoses and Nocturna to play near the Chrono Tower.

203671.text: The girl was kinda surprised when hearing about the Chrono Tower.

203672.text: Yes, the Chrono Tower! But, I got lost near it...

203673.text: Many things happened, but at last, I finally saw Metamorphoses.

203674.text: Speaking of Metamorphoses, the Dragon Lass suddenly burst into tears.

203676.text: The girl gently touched the Dragon Lass' head and let her go on.

203677.text: Although I met Metamorphoses, I still haven't see Nocturna.

203678.text: We waited for her for a long time near the Chrono Tower, but she still didn't show up.

203679.text: So I thought that maybe she was lost, too, and I looked for her around the Chrono Tower.

203680.text: Then one day, I heard some voice in my head. It was a fragmented voice and not very clear.

203681.text: The girl was lost in thought.

203682.text: After hearing the voice, we were in a trance for a while. When we came back to our senses, we were already here.

203683.text: Hearing this, the girl nodded, saying that she had come here in the same way.

203684.text: But when I and Metamorphoses first arrived, there were no such mirrors here.

203686.text: Yes! There was nothing but the platform under our feet.

203687.text: After a while, suddenly a load of black monsters appeared out of thin air and surrounded us.

203688.text: Those demons couldn't stop you, could they?

203689.text: Hee-hee, you're a sharp one, Ella can turn into a dragon!

203690.text: So I tried to use my dragon power for the first time.

203691.text: But... There was a force that limited my power, Metamorphoses couldn't control souls here so we could only cast very basic spells.

203692.text: Unable to use my power, coupled with too many monsters, Metamorphoses and I were overwhelmed.

203693.text: To protect me, Metamorphoses... she... uhm...

203694.text: At that moment, the girl stood up and pointed to the fourth picture.

203696.text: The Dragon Lass rushed eagerly into the mirror, the girl could do nothing else but follow her.

203697.text: Where is Metamorphoses? Give her back to me!

203698.text: Hee-hee, is this the Metamorphoses you mentioned?

203699.text: A masked girl in white appears silently, She controls a thousand masks that are used to surround the Dragon Lass.

203700.text: Seeing the Dragon Lass surrounded, the girl shot out her magic arrows, breaking up the monsters.

203701.text: Hee-hee, you're also here, are you? Meet our true selves!

203702.text: Mm-hmm... There's gonna be a big fight... it wasn't easy to find a toy like this one...

203703.text: Hmph! You dare come here? Take this then!

203704.text: If we can't hold her off here, then I'll need to do it myself.

203705.text: The girl in white began to emit black gas, and countless masks flew to her, gradually turning into a huge black shadow.

203706.text: Look out! The monsters are gathering!

203707.text: How dare you tamper with all those souls. It's unforgivable!

203708.text: Countless masks covered the girl's face, and the girl had a splitting headache, falling onto her knees.

203709.text: She darted under the stone pillar to break the chains and held the girl in red in her arms.

203710.text: How's this? This is the voice of the soul that you haven't heard before. They are roaring loudly, expressing their fury.

203711.text: Pictures appeared in the mind of the girl.

203712.text: It turned out that when the monsters were destroyed, they turned into black gas and all entered the girl's body as she was unconscious.

203714.text: The emptiness is deep enough, let us become one now.

203715.text: The girl began to exude a load of black gas.

203716.text: Her hair grew dark. A shimmering red light appeared in her eyes, and a powerful aura burst through her body.

203718.text: The aura's too powerful, if it keeps growing we'll be flattened by it!

203719.text: So much soul power, if only Metamorphoses were here...

203721.text: Fluttering gracefully like a butterfly, a young girl in white descended slowly.

203723.text: Don't get so excited, let's save everyone while we can.

203724.text: With such a raging flood of souls, it might be a little tricky...

203725.text: Hmph, what do you think you can do right nowl, then?

203726.text: Ella, share your magic with me, I can't help her on my own.

203728.text: Purple magic flows into the girl's body, eliminating the black gas.

203729.text: Focus. I'm here to help you calm your soul.

203730.text: Following my magic, you exert your own magic and suppress them.

203731.text: Haha, if your abilities were at their prime then I may be a little scared of you.

203732.text: But as you are right now, you're absolutely no match!

203733.text: Tch, the turbulent torrent of souls has become even more frenzied.

203734.text: If only my powers hasn't been weakened.

203735.text: At this time in the body of the girl, the two figures were constantly colliding with one another. In the end, the figure of the girl was hit away..

203736.text: What are you still holding on to? You have no sense of self, but you're still trying to hold on to it?

203737.text: The girl just shook her head and stood up firmly.

203739.text: Just then, the world reverberated with the whispering of young girls as a shining shooting star fell from the sky.

203741.text: Metamorphoses, look at the sky! It's so beautiful!

203742.text: Is that a shooting star? No, Ella, stay away from her. Get out of here!

203743.text: Huh? Why... Whoa! That was close. The shooting star hit the ground!

203744.text: The black gas melts like ice when it meets the light of a shooting star.

203745.text: Ella, collect the fragments of the shooting star with me and put them next to her!

203747.text: With the glow of the shooting star, the black gas around the girl gradually dissipated.

203748.text: Damn it! My plan was messed up by that bastard again! I won't let go of such a good vessel!

203749.text: Looks like I'll have to resort to my final plan early, then! I best do it before they find out I'm still inside the witch...

203750.text: After the black gas on the girl disappeared completely, she finally woke up.

203752.text: You're awake! Metamorphoses, what was all that black gas, exactly?

203753.text: I don't know yet, it can enter other people's bodies. By the way, what are these mirrors about?

203754.text: Well... There's a different world in each mirror and it shows the image that's in the mirror!

203756.text: No time to play around with you guys, I have to get to the final altar quickly!

203757.text: The black gas from the girl burst out of her again and flew quickly to the fifth mirror.

203758.text: The two tried to stop it but no matter how hard they tried, the mirror wouldn't budge, and it finally swallowed the girl up.

203759.text: Unfortunately, the attack didn't work at all.

203760.text: What can we do now? She was... if only we still had our power...

203761.text: Didn't you just say that the mirror will show a picture of the mirror world? I'll go and check, there may be information about her there.

203763.text: But what can be seen from the mirror's picture is...

203767.text: They are all in the mirror, let's get in there quickly.

203768.text: (If the mirror shows the world inside the mirror, maybe only one person can be found.)

203769.text: They quickly entered the mirror only to find...

203770.text: Why is there only one way here?

203771.text: We'll just have to follow the road.

203773.text: I'm so tired! Is there no end to this road? I don't want to go on anymore!

203774.text: The time here seems to be distorted.

203775.text: My magic power and physical strength are not really tired out, but my body is getting heavier and heavier. Is it just my imagination?

203777.text: I can't! I really can't walk! I can't see clearly anymore. I'm so tired, so hungry...

203781.text: Hey. Metamorphoses, am I dreaming right now? I can see a lot of delicious food fall from the sky!

203782.text: How can you think about food when you're like this? Wait... This food doesn't seem to just be a hallucination...

203783.text: Woah, there's so much delicious food!

203784.text: Be careful, this is all suspicious– Erm... you've started eating already?

203785.text: Hey! You try this. It's good!

203786.text: The girl in white took a nibble.

203788.text: Metamorphoses, is it just me or am I getting sleepier the more I eat... Huh? Asleep already?

203790.text: Two lumps of mud squirmed out from behind the two girls who had fallen asleep.

203791.text: They wriggled and merged into a huge mass of mud.

203792.text: Look at this contented smile! Eat and sleep, idle away time, life really should be spent like this!

203793.text: Now, let me feast on your power!

203795.text: With the girl's whisper, a large number of shooting stars fell from the sky and broke the mirror.

203796.text: Oh no, I'll be screwed if I don't leave.

203797.text: The mud slipped away at an incredible speed.

203798.text: This pie is delicious, Metamorphoses. Don't take my pie!

203799.text: Huh? What is that cracking noise? It's so loud!

203800.text: Looks like the stars broke the mirror.

203801.text: So we're just gonna sleep here?

203802.text: Yeah, looks like the enemy's got us in their trap.

203803.text: I feel much more refreshed and rejuvinated now.

203805.text: The falling shooting stars gradually formed a path.

203807.text: Just before that dangerous moment just before, the shooting stars can always appeared with the voice of the girl. I think we might as well follow them.

203808.text: Besides, shooting stars can dispel the black gas, and we can collect some to use against monsters.

203810.text: The two walked along the path of the stars for some time and the sky gradually darkened.

203811.text: A lake appeared in front of them and the yellowish crescent moon in the night sky gave off a charming halo.

203812.text: In the moonlight, delicious food piled up like a mountain, and a familiar figure was lying on the bench.

203814.text: Her taste never changes no matter where she goes.

203815.text: Nocturna greeted them drowsily when she saw them coming.

203816.text: Welcome to my moonlight dinner, the moonlight is so beautiful tonight.

203817.text: You made the moon, isn't it the same every time?

203818.text: Wow, there's a lot of delicious food! But it all looks familiar.

203819.text: Long time no see, just help yourself.

203820.text: Nocturna, we were supposed to hang out near the Chrono Tower. Why didn't you go there?

203821.text: Because this place is amazing! There's endless food and wine.

203822.text: Time passes slowly, even if I slack off for a long time, only a short time passes. It's a paradise!

203823.text: Ella, do you see something on Nocturna's back?

203824.text: There's a puddle of... something that looks like mud!

203825.text: Well, Nocturna, you always treat us both to nice meals, how about we treat you this time?

203826.text: Why not? What are you guys going to treat me to?

203827.text: Tee-hee, why this of course. Take it! Ella's specially-made star pie!

203831.text: How dare you plot against the three of us! You really have some guts!

203832.text: I can't let you off easily.

203833.text: Damn it! Don't chase it away! I can't slack off without it, ah hell!

203834.text: Huh? Didn't you ask us to supervise you and prevent you from slacking off?

203835.text: The thrown shooting stars burst into a dazzling light, followed by a familiar sound of breaking and shattering.

203836.text: Nocturna, listen to that cracking sound.

203837.text: The mirror is about to get smashed, and your vacation is coming to an end.

203838.text: Let's go play, Nocturna! See you in the next mirror!

203840.text: The vampire girl's figure disappeared in a poof of black gas.

203844.text: Tee-hee, I can't do that I'm afraid. Stars... go!

203845.text: As the mirror world crumbled, the mud escaped through the cracks.

203846.text: Ella, stop it. You've summoned too many stars, the world can't hold on much longer.

203847.text: But I just need to hit it with one more!

203848.text: Stop, safety is our priority now.

203849.text: By the way, you said Nocturna would be in the next mirror, didn't you?

203850.text: Yes, we'll be turned into energy here first and then split into two and sealed in different mirrors.

203851.text: She conquered two mirrors to save us.

203852.text: Ella, do you think the shape of the mirror world has something to do with our own life experiences?

203853.text: It seems so. When I was sealed, the black gas tried to get into my body, but luckily we got you and these stars.

203854.text: All right, let's just put this behind us and catch up with the monster.

203855.text: At this time–in the depths of the starry sky

203856.text: That girl with the great hole in her chest, she is my vessel.

203857.text: When the mind and body are broken, two will become one.

203859.text: In the sixth mirror, endless flames were burning everywhere as the scarlet full moon shone brightly and strangely in the sky.

203860.text: It's really fast as well! If only I could turn into a dragon...

203861.text: The Dragon Lass, who was focused on chasing the enemy, did not notice the bright scarlet full moon in the sky.

203863.text: The white-clothed girl grabbed the Dragon Lass immediately.

203865.text: At this time, a harsh wind sped by.

203868.text: The blood-red full moon–No! Nocturna, she...

203870.text: The vampire was already on a rampage, attacking the young girls in a fury.

203872.text: What a pity for Nocturna, she managed to find a place here to slack off and now look.

203873.text: She hadn't slacked off for long before she was caught and thrown under the full moon–

203874.text: She deserved it, all she ever wanted to do was slack off.

203875.text: Then we can't just watch her like this, can we? It's still too much for her body to handle going into such a rampage..

203876.text: What's wrong with that? If she rampages for a good while then she'll be able to spend much longer in bed relaxing, just like she wants.

203877.text: Oh Metamorphoses, you're so sly! Let me shoot that moon down! Hey–!

203879.text: The flames engulfed the world as soon as the stars were out of her hand, and a huge figure suddenly appeared in the flames.

203880.text: The figure attacked the two girls with huge claws and smashed the stars.

203881.text: Tsk... Seems saving Nocturna won't be that easy.

203882.text: Ella, are you okay? I can feel its violent aura.

203883.text: It's just a scratch, luckily I've got fast reactions!

203884.text: Its aura is more violent than Nocturna's! What can we do?

203885.text: Damn it... Nocturna always makes trouble for me.

203886.text: I'm going to give her a good talking to when this is all over!

203888.text: But the figure smacked Nocturna away with one claw and the mud monster appeared with other monsters.

203889.text: Hey, let's knock you down a peg or two.

203890.text: Bastard! How dare you do this to my friend–I will cut you into pieces!

203891.text: Calm down, Ella! Without the power of the stars and just our own strength right now, we cannot cope with these monsters.

203893.text: Damn! Why does it seem to get more aggressive the more it gets injured?

203894.text: Ha... ha... I didn't think I'd hit my limit so soon.

203895.text: Metamorphoses! Get behind me now! You're too badly wounded!

203896.text: I don't need to be protected by a fool like you yet.

203897.text: What's more, you're my most important friend!

203899.text: Tremendous star power flew from the sky and struck the monster straight in the head.

203900.text: Wow! The monster has been repelled by the star!

203901.text: A dark shadow rose into the sky, and then fell slowly with black feathers fluttering across the sky.

203902.text: The figure held the girl in one hand and a huge black flame in the other.

203903.text: Flame of sin, concentrate into a sharp blade and cut down the enemy!

203904.text: What a powerful force! Huh? The seal inside me has been lifted?

203906.text: I am Acheronte, ruler of the River of the Underworld.

203907.text: The end mirror has been conquered and your seal shall be lifted.

203908.text: This girl is in danger, we should unite together to defeat the mirror monster.

203909.text: The girls looked at each other and began to use their power.

203910.text: Oh numerous souls, please answer my call!

203911.text: Wait, let me summon some stars first! Go ahead, Ella's special-made star pie!

203913.text: At this moment–in the body of the girl.

203914.text: I didn't expect that the ruler of the River of the Underworld would also be here.

203915.text: It's so dark here... Anyone here?

203916.text: But even if you save her from the mirror.

203918.text: The girl hugged herself, trying to keep warm.

203920.text: The huge burning blade cut the monster into half, and the long-separated friend finally appeared.

203922.text: Phew–We can finally get out of there and breathe some fresh air.

203923.text: Wow! Nocturna! I thought we'd never see you again...

203925.text: Why didn't you go to the Chrono Tower!

203927.text: Didn't we say that we'd go and play near the Chrono Tower?

203928.text: The girl in white burst out laughing after hearing this.

203930.text: Haha! I can't take it, nobody can be this silly!

203932.text: Nocturna was talking about going to the forest of Lunia.

203934.text: Did you hear that there was some tasty food near the Chrono Tower that led you to being so silly?

203936.text: As it turns out, Nocturna was right to let me follow you.

203937.text: Who else in this world would plan to go to Lunia but finally get lost by the Chrono Tower?

203938.text: I planned to come out earlier to remind you, but it was so funny seeing you get lost, so I didn't tell you.

203939.text: Ahhh! Metamorphoses, that's so cruel of you!

203940.text: So then Nocturna, did you have fun in Lunia?

203941.text: Sure! Something very interesting happened to me, I'll tell you about it later.

203942.text: What about after that? How did you end up here?

203943.text: I didn't see you near the forest of Lunia, so I thought you might have gotten lost on your way.

203944.text: So I walked over to Muntenia to see if I could find you.

203945.text: Then I ended up caught in this place, but it's a shame really... I quite liked it here.

203946.text: You're such a simpleton sometimes! If it weren't for us, you would have been possessed by black gas by now.

203947.text: 你还好意思说！要不是你们，我哪用遭满月的罪？害我现在身体还在痛！

203949.text: 咏叹者虽莞尔一笑，但随即打断了少女们的谈话。

203950.text: 闲聊到此为止，汝等再在此聒噪，此女的生命之火便消逝了。

203951.text: 少女身上的黑气越来越多。

203953.text: 艾拉，别担心，她会没事的。

203954.text: 于是，众人将星辰摆满了少女的身旁，如众星捧月般。

203955.text: 在星辰柔和的光芒照耀下，少女身上的黑气逐渐消失，表情也不再痛苦。

203956.text: 随后，艾拉等人向阿鵺伦阐述了现状。

203957.text: 吾等来此必是和这世界渊源匪浅，但妾身不曾被束缚。

203958.text: 我们都被囚禁过，只有攻克两面对应的镜子，才会被释放。

203961.text: 现在七面镜子都已被攻克，为什么还没有回到原本的世界啊？大姐姐也没有清醒。

203962.text: 这么看的话，她应该是此次事件的核心了。

203963.text: 统治者大人，说一说你在第七面镜子中具体的经历吧，也许能发现什么细节。

203965.text: 咏叹者便开始讲述自己在这里的经历——

203967.text: 时间回溯，第七面镜子中——

203968.text: 此地没有灵魂的气息，看来并非冥途之川，妾身究竟身在何处？

203969.text: 这时，远处突然传来了少女的惨叫。

203972.text: 咏叹者向着声音飞去，一个巨大的祭坛映入眼帘。少女被束缚在祭坛的中心，释放出强大的气场。

203975.text: 四面八方突然爆发出大量的黑气，疯狂地钻入少女的身体。

203976.text: 这黑气是梦魇？但又有些不一致，若是见多识广的她在这里的话就好了。

203979.text: 后背？汝身上怎会有如此巨大的空洞！中心这纽带……

203980.text: 原来如此，未知之地的邪灵啊，见到妾身还不现身？

203981.text: 你猜的没有错，冥途之川的统治者啊。

203982.text: 召唤你过来纯属是意外，现在，可以请你回去吗？

203983.text: 注意你的口气，妾身从未有被如此冒犯过！

203984.text: 这么说，你是一定要掺和在此事中了？

203985.text: 妾身不仅要掺和，还要邀请汝这等邪灵来冥途之川游玩一趟。

203986.text: 谁让妾身是这世间最阴暗之地的统治者呢。

203987.text: 我敬你是一域统治者，没想到竟如此不知好歹。

203989.text: 哈哈，我会怕你？你也太不知天高地厚了。就让你见识一下我的力量吧！

203990.text: 力量？窃取他人力量作威作福的汝，也配谈力量？

203992.text: 庞大的魔力将咏叹者的周围的地面破坏殆尽。

203993.text: 竟是时空魔法？这女孩是何来历？

203994.text: 那个女孩快要撑不下去了，快带她逃离这里！

203995.text: 在这里，你是无法战胜她的！我会召唤星辰掩护你！

203996.text: 是谁胆敢在妾身的脑海中说话？

203997.text: 快！一旦她被吞噬，后果不堪设想！

203999.text: 整个世界开始震动，伴随着星辰落下，不断有镜子破碎的声音传来。

204000.text: 一道道刺眼的白光通过缝隙射入镜子内。

204001.text: 又是你！三番五次地阻碍我！等我把她们都收拾了，就去收拾你！

204002.text: 我制造了屏障阻挡她离开这里，你快趁现在带着女孩逃跑！

204003.text: 咏叹者将少女抱入怀中，迅速飞起

204004.text: 休想！出来吧！吾之血肉！撕碎她们！

204006.text: 不要怕！你只要坚持到白光将整片世界覆盖即可。

204007.text: 妾身便信任你一回！接招吧！

204008.text: 就是现在！赶快脱离这里！

204011.text: 妾身出来时，汝等所在的镜子正发出巨大的声响。

204012.text: 若非汝等的姿态属实不堪，妾身也不会帮助汝等。

204013.text: 龙之少女蹲在了少女身旁，陷入了思考。

204014.text: 这少女的声音是谁呢？每次危难关头都会帮助我们，还带来了星辰。

204015.text: 可以肯定的是，对我们没有恶意。

204016.text: 事情没有这么简单，你们不觉得可疑吗？

204018.text: 之前的声音都是断断续续的，完全听不清她在说什么。为何在统治者大人那里就如此清晰流畅。

204019.text: 统治者大人离开镜子时，确定魔物被挡在屏障后面，被白光消灭了吗？

204021.text: 不好了！大姐姐身上又爆发出了黑气！

204022.text: 果然是这样，我们被骗了。

204023.text: 可恶啊，到现在了我们还对这个世界一无所知！

204024.text: 冷静下来！妾身与她交战时，发觉黑气与灵魂之力极为相似。

204025.text: 梅莫菲斯，汝有控制灵魂之力，命汝与妾身共同压制黑气。

204026.text: 艾拉、诺忒娜，汝等去收集星辰，越多越好。

204029.text: 不行！这次我们二人合力压制也阻挡不了！

204030.text: 就连星辰也是肉眼可见的变成黑色了。

204033.text: 此时，少女心中有一面巨大的镜子，上面显示着少女自己。下一秒，少女变成了狰狞的魔物。

204034.text: 镜子旁有一堆篝火，微弱的火光好像随时都会熄灭。少女在篝火旁痛苦地抱着头，一幅幅画面在脑海中闪过。

204035.text: 我想要让这个世界恢复原貌……

204036.text: 少女正在和一个孤独的身影交谈着。

204037.text: 在这里停步，谁都无法拯救，连我的世界也会毁灭。

204038.text: 少女似乎在煽动着什么。

204039.text: 魔力泄露的根源似乎就在……之下

204041.text: 少女向着前方坚定的前进。

204045.text: 少女身上冒出大量的黑气，与一幅幅画面共舞，形成了一片风暴。

204048.text: 看到这幅光景的少女露出不可置信的表情。

204053.text: 请你停止……消除这世界的……是我的……

204054.text: 这，便是我吗？这些片段，是未来？

204055.text: 不然还能有谁呢？这一切都要问你自己。

204057.text: 不要再美化自己的行为了！你何曾真正明白【拯救】的含义？你能带来的只有无尽的毁灭。

204058.text: 想要拯救一切的【欲望】，然你实则关心的是自己世界的安危。

204059.text: 拯救一切前的【吞噬】，总是打着拯救的旗号吞噬着别人的力量。

204060.text: 镜花水月的【诱导】，你可曾考虑过现在的所作所为是否皆出自己意。

204061.text: 千万分身的【事象】，每一个世界都有你干涉的身影。

204062.text: 止步不前的【懈怠】，令其他世界毁灭后，不去调查真相，总是将恢复世界的希望寄托在下一个世界。

204063.text: 无能为力的【愤怒】，不断毁灭，不断悲愤自己的无能，却依旧重复一次次悲剧，不管过去，现在亦或是未来。

204064.text: 自以为是的【傲慢】，总是觉得自己的行为是拯救世界的正解。

204065.text: 你连做我的容器的资格都尚且不足，何谈做她的？

204066.text: 风暴将少女完全笼罩，少女的眼神逐渐失去光芒。

204068.text: 从今以后，汝名为……拉。人类的世界可是非常有趣的……

204069.text: 今夜的月光很美好，很适合去……血呢~

204070.text: 没有感情很痛苦吧？我来教你……别人……感的能力吧？

204072.text: 你的存在从不被世界所需要。放弃吧，把它交给我。

204073.text: 背部的空洞已将身体贯穿，无数黑气汹涌而入。此刻代表命运前来制裁的使者，已完成化形。

204074.text: 所有人都是命运的奴隶，你也不例外。

204075.text: 犹如带线木偶一般，在命运的股掌间手舞足蹈。可悲，可叹。

204076.text: 少女张开双臂，放弃最后一丝抵抗，迎接命运的化身。命运疯狂地吞噬着少女的力量，填补着少女身上巨大的空洞。

204078.text: 从此以后，我便是你，你便是我。

204079.text: 终于，可以离开这世界了。哈哈！

204081.text: 吾本不想现身，奈何实在容不下汝的行为。

204083.text: My name is Asherah. I am the Protector of Irminsul, the land of glory.

204085.text: 若非汝在第二面镜子中的能量，吾也不会再次苏醒。

204086.text: 怎么？汝方才还在大言不惭地自诩命运。

204087.text: 如今见到吾竟如此失态？

204088.text: 哼，被我吞噬的败者还敢在我面前出现？

204090.text: 没想到汝竟能说出如此厚颜无耻之语！

204091.text: 现在，我即是她，她即是我。

204092.text: 没有丝毫忏悔之心，只会展示人性弱点的汝，

204093.text: 会是选择承担责任的她？

204095.text: 埃舍雷！你为何要坏我好事？

204096.text: 你忘记此女毁掉了你的世界吗？

204097.text: 无礼之徒！住口！吾自然从未忘记，不需你来多嘴。

204098.text: 若此时放任汝将她吞噬，伊敏瑟伦的未来将何去何从？

204099.text: 可恶！如果我说我会拯救伊敏瑟伦呢？可以请你现在不要插手吗？

204100.text: 要吾相信汝这等利用人性黑暗的无耻之徒？这绝不可能！

204101.text: 禁忌的魔女啊，汝还要睡到何时？

204103.text: 汝甘心就被这样的货色替代吗？汝击败吾时的决心与信念呢？不惜要击败守护者也想拯救世界的觉悟呢？

204104.text: 吾还在期待汝如何同时拯救汝的世界及吾的世界呢。

204105.text: 如此这般放弃一切，失去自我，吾实在错看了汝。如不在此战胜自我，如何去拯救世界？

204106.text: 现在，给吾苏醒，承担一切！

204107.text: 点点生命能量从空洞中流出，覆盖了少女全身。

204108.text: 黑气逐渐被剥离，少女的世界重新出现了光明。

204109.text: 啊——是啊！一直以来太过孤独，陷入了固执中而忘记了最重要的东西。

204110.text: 汝确实给世界带来毁灭，却是怀着拯救之心去做的。

204111.text: 哪怕陷入深深地自责中，却也不断地尝试弥补自己所犯之错。

204112.text: 不要忘记汝曾经的承诺以及肩负的责任，便是对吾最大的感谢。

204114.text: 魔物，现在请你从我的身体里离开！

204115.text: 荣耀之地的守护之力啊，再次绽放吧！

204116.text: 染指禁忌的魔女啊，感受吾生命之力的真谛，

204117.text: 驱逐黑暗，化作光明，找回自我吧！

204118.text: 少女用力将法杖一挥，无尽的生命能量伴随巨大的花瓣流淌而出。

204119.text: 一团漆黑的能量体被驱逐而出。

204120.text: 这便是最后了，吾即将离去，接下来便全靠汝自身了。

204121.text: 无论何时，谨记自身必须达成之事。

204125.text: 如此也好，就让我亲手终结你！

204126.text: 接招吧！今天，我要在此直面自身，战胜自我！

204128.text: 以少女为中心，爆发出了强烈的光芒。

204132.text: 一团黑色能量体从少女体内被驱逐而出，极速逃窜。

204133.text: 同时，一颗光玉从那身影中剥离而出，被少女吸收。

204134.text: 可恶的埃舍雷，我不会放过你的！

204135.text: 从今往后，我会直面自我，也许还会迷惘。但只要有此光芒在，便不会再丢失自我。

204136.text: 自我，是需要自己去定义的。受死吧！你这可悲的命运！

204138.text: 少女将命运一击粉碎，这一瞬，世界仿佛就此定格。

204139.text: 随后，一股强大的光波爆发，席卷整个世界。

204140.text: 随着光波的蔓延，世界犹如被打破的镜子般粉碎，显露出真实的空间。

204142.text: 看来我们终于从那世界中脱离出来了。

204144.text: 世界中心有一张巨大的床，一名少女正呼呼大睡，不时皱眉发出可爱的梦呓。

204146.text: 真是拿你没办法，睡着了还想着吃。

204147.text: 啊——你们终于来到此地了。

204148.text: 这声音……在那世界帮助吾等的便是汝吧？

204150.text: 可以请你说明一下现在的状况吗？

204152.text: 床上睡着的可爱家伙叫南奈尔，是虚空之境入口的看守者，

204153.text: 拥有掌握镜之世界的能力。

204154.text: 我也是南奈尔，是她在镜子中的镜像，一体两面，负责守护她的安危。

204155.text: 那么将我们召唤至此的原因是？

204156.text: 不要那么着急嘛！现实世界和镜中世界互为正反关系。

204157.text: 因此，在镜中世界中很容易积累负面能量，诞生出许多不好的东西。

204158.text: 而不让它们从镜中世界逃离，便是我们二人的隐秘职责。

204159.text: 但这次的情况非常特殊，照常来讲，这孩子睡觉的地方应当是不会被入侵的，毕竟是镜中世界之主。

204160.text: 也许是负面能量积攒的太多，总之，有一波负面能量趁这孩子休息的时候，入侵了她的梦境，化身为梦魇袭击她。

204199.text: It's you again... Why do you keep following me?...

204200.text: It looks like you need to suffer a little!

204201.text: You've got some skills, unlike those commoners.

204205.text: You are not coming to challenge me? Then what are you up to? Need my help？

204206.text: I'm just trying to find a way to stop the blizzard.

204207.text: Why are you bothering me? I don't know...

204208.text: But you spoke about the frozen world...

204209.text: Does the blizzard have anything to do with you?

204210.text: What nonsense are you talking about? I may have magic beyond any mortals' reach, but I'm an open-minded individual. I'm not interested in doing such boring things.

204211.text: Why don't you get out of the way? I told you, the blizzard has nothing to do with me.

204212.text: You're so annoying. Lilia is still waiting for me. We're going to attend a ceremony together, I'll be late if I keep dawdling with you here.

204213.text: The Protector on the mountain top should know about the blizzard. Go to her if you have any questions and stop pestering me!

204214.text: Just as suspected, maybe we'll find out once we get to the top.

204215.text: Let's head to the mountain top.

204216.text: So naive. Is that really true?

204218.text: Don't you think that girl was suspicious?

204220.text: She seemed to be avoiding us the whole time. Could it be that the blizzard may have something to do with her, so she told us a wrong direction on purpose?

204221.text: Are we really going to find the wolf pack? Wolves are ferocious predators!

204222.text: Don't worry, I'm here with you.

204223.text: But there are so many of them, I'm afraid that if I'm with only you...

204224.text: If anything goes wrong, we will retreat...

204225.text: Well, if there is a fight, just run away!

204226.text: That was a big one, what a fright.

204227.text: I thought this place was short of food. How can such a giant bear survive here?

204228.text: It's better not to mess with these beasts...

204229.text: But it attacked the humans first...

204230.text: A wolf's howl, right around here.

204231.text: The wolf pack's territory should be up ahead.

204232.text: It's freezing, the blizzard is getting heavier.

204233.text: Just hang in there for a bit longer and we'll go light a fire up ahead.

204234.text: Let's make a run over there, my hands are all frozen red.

204235.text: So it was these guys who were behind all the trouble.

204237.text: Didn't they say why? They wanted to stir up conflicts between humans and wolves.

204238.text: Why hasn't Pakane come yet? Did she run into trouble on the way?

204239.text: Excuse me, may I ask you something?

204240.text: I am Lilia from Holmgard, I have made plans to go to a festival with my friend, but I have waited for a long time and still haven't seen her.

204241.text: Excuse me, have you seen a sorceress with a wand and magical wings on her back?

204244.text: Did you see her? Where is she...

204247.text: Ah, it's you... Why are you here?

204249.text: I don't know this stalker. All right then Lilia, let's go to the festival.

204252.text: There are no such festivals in my hometown so it's going to be a precious experience.

204253.text: I haven't been to a lively place like this in a long time. Human villages really are interesting, let's go see the ice sculptures later.

204254.text: Ah, it's you again! I told you about the blizzard, don't bother me any more!

204255.text: I want to know how to stop the blizzard...

204256.text: I told you, all you have to do is go to the Glacial Castle on top of the mountain. You're really annoying, such a buzzkill.

204257.text: The ice sculpture show is about to start, Lilia. let's go!

204258.text: Sorry, Pakane did not mean any harm, it's the first time I've seen her so flustered.

204261.text: I'm sorry that I accidentally played a trick on such a lovely person like Pakane...

204262.text: This is not my homeland, so I'm very interested in the Glacial Castle you talked about.

204263.text: Is it at the top of the mountain? I really want to go see it with you after the ice sculpture show.

204264.text: There seems to be the cry of a beast ahead.

204265.text: Could it be the big bear from before... I don't want to fight that monster again.

204266.text: How did you manage to get here?

204267.text: By the time we got to the ice sculpture show, the show was over. Pakane seemed kind of disappointed and went back to Landnama, but I wanted to stay here for a while.

204268.text: The castle at the top of the mountain...

204269.text: Yeah, I've been to the mountain top. It's really a magnificent castle. There are castles in my country but they can't be compared with that one at all. It's hard to describe in words.

204270.text: The castle is just ahead, let's go check it out.

204271.text: I didn't think that there were humans who could control monsters...

204272.text: Don't you think those monsters are disgusting? I can't believe there could be people who are willing to commit themselves to the darkness...

204273.text: And that guy was saying something inexplicable.

204274.text: After all, he's been in the tower for too long...

204275.text: In my homeland, this state of mind is called a mental disorder, he needs to see a doctor.

204276.text: They seem to be sealing up those cracks in the ground.

204277.text: What's the point of going through so much trouble to do such a thing?

204278.text: It should have something to do with the truth of this world...

204279.text: Come on, let's keep up. Maybe we'll find something.

204280.text: There's a barrier like the one from before.

204281.text: Let's go look around for clues.

204282.text: There seems to be a fight up ahead.

204283.text: That voice... it's the hunter we just met?

204285.text: Get out of here quickly or we'll be attacked by those monsters again.

204287.text: It should be the magic circle that controls the barrier.

204288.text: Such an important magic circle must be heavily guarded, be careful.

204289.text: What's all that noise? It seems like there's a fight.

204290.text: A strange sound? I didn't hear it...

204291.text: I'm pretty confident in my hearing, someone's shouting commands to people.

204293.text: It's like a bunch of people fighting some kind of monster, I think we should go over there to check it out.

204294.text: Up ahead is the camp the guards mentioned, right? Are they also being attacked by monsters?

204295.text: They must need our help, let's not waste time here.

204296.text: Shall we return the bow to that daredevil?

204298.text: The one who dug a hole and got herself into it.

204300.text: Lady La Crima, it's been so long. You...

204303.text: Don't look at me like that, I didn't do anything...

204304.text: Lady La Crima is afraid of talking with people, we're all used to it. She may have a bit of an eccentric personality, but her magical talents are nevertheless top tier.

204305.text: Never mind that, let's just get to work on those cracks on the ground.

204306.text: Ah, it's you, long time no see. Thanks to your help, I repelled those monsters at the camp.

204308.text: Those monsters have been appearing everywhere recently. Our order does not have enough manpower to deal with them...

204309.text: I saw Lady La Crima just now, she is the heir of the Gem Magic. If you get her help, you won't have to be afraid of those monsters.

204310.text: She was here just a moment ago, but she's just disappeared. How strange...

204311.text: Thank you for stopping me, goodbye!

204313.text: It seems to have something written on it...

204314.text: This is a record of... an ancient lost swordsmanship technique!

204315.text: The blood of the sword that flows in my body will ascend me to a higher place!

204317.text: Is there any secret nearby that Eulalia doesn't know?

204319.text: The key to solving the riddle is nearby.

204320.text: Is that the payment for my performance?

204321.text: Is that the answer to the riddle?

204322.text: The aroma of flowers is close by.

204323.text: Search carefully, we should be able to find clues to the riddle.

204324.text: What a beautiful melody. Is it around here?

204325.text: The key to solving the riddle is nearby.

204326.text: What could be hidden in this chest?

204327.text: That's not gonna be a problem to Anemone, the answer's right over there.

204328.text: Is there a reward for Anemone around here?

204329.text: Is that a... riddle over there?

204330.text: Is there anything good around here?

204331.text: Search carefully, the clue is nearby.

204333.text: The answer to the riddle lies in the darkness...

204334.text: Explore carefully and your efforts won't be in vain.

204335.text: Haven't you noticed? The clue is nearby.

204337.text: The key to solving the riddle is nearby.

204338.text: Is that a... chest over there?

204339.text: What's over there? I'm very interested.

204340.text: Is that a reward for me?

204343.text: The key to solving the riddle is nearby.

204344.text: Is that... Guidance from God over there?

204345.text: I won't be trapped by this kind of difficulty.

204346.text: I look forward to it... The pain in the box...

204347.text: Explore carefully and your efforts won't be in vain.

204348.text: The gift from God is nearby.

204349.text: Let me guess, the answer is over there.

204350.text: Something tells me the treasure is nearby.

204351.text: Don't worry, the clue is nearby.

204352.text: Hurry up, there's the reward you deserved.

204353.text: The key to solving the riddle is nearby.

204354.text: Hold on a little longer, supplies are nearby.

204357.text: The clue is nearby, don't try to trap me.

204358.text: The grace of the wind lies somewhere around here.

204359.text: The result of divination points forward.

204361.text: Pay attention to the clues around you.

204362.text: There's always something to be gained by being careful.

204364.text: Is that a gift from someone else? Woo-hoo, it's over there!

204365.text: The answer is around here, it's really exciting.

204373.text: Well, the answer's right over there.

204374.text: Is it a reward for me? Bring it to me now.

204375.text: Do you think such a simple riddle would stump me?

204377.text: Want a hint from me? The answer's over there.

204378.text: Open the chest and give me the treasure inside.

204379.text: There is no doubt that the answer lies ahead.

204380.text: The fire of hell shall be returned to you!

204381.text: Search carefully, the clue is nearby.

204382.text: I'm looking forward to the chest ahead.

204383.text: The answer to the riddle? Isn't it just up ahead?

204384.text: Is that the reward for practicing?

204386.text: It's a gift from the goddess, just take it.

204388.text: What's in the chest? Come on, open it!

204389.text: The answer to the riddle is over there, it's almost time for a break.

204390.text: Is that the reward for hard work?

204392.text: Explore carefully and your efforts won't be in vain.

204393.text: The clue's right over there, I'm glad I could help.

204394.text: The reward chest, you want me to open it for you?

204395.text: Let's go solve riddles, I'm really good at it!

204396.text: Is the shiny thing... a chest?

204400.text: That chest over there, you deserve it.

204401.text: Do you want to solve riddles? But the answer to the riddle is just over there.

204402.text: There's a chest over there, quickly open it.

204403.text: Searching for clues carefully following the God's guidance.

204404.text: This is the gift of the God.

204406.text: Is that... a gift over there?

204407.text: Look, the clue is right over there!

204408.text: That's... a gift from someone. Who could it be?

204409.text: Take a look over there, the clue is right there.

204411.text: Hurry up and look, Nannar is going back.

204412.text: What... could be inside of it...

204413.text: God instructed us to check out there.

204414.text: Open the chest and thank God for his gift.

204415.text: I know there is a clue there, but can we just not go over there?

204416.text: Ah, is it a game of "guess what's in the chest"?

204418.text: Is it a reward for me?

204421.text: The clue is over there, go and find it.

204422.text: The new material for the experiment is nearby.

204423.text: The key to solving the riddle is nearby.

204424.text: It's a gift from the goddess.

204425.text: The clue is right over there.

204426.text: That chest over there is probably for you.

204428.text: Exploring nearby will naturally pay off.

204429.text: The clue is right over there.

204430.text: Is it a gift from someone?

204431.text: The unknown riddle is very interesting to me.

204433.text: Attention, the clue is right over there.

204435.text: The key to solving the riddle is nearby.

204436.text: Exploring nearby will naturally pay off.

204437.text: The hint to solving the riddle is right over there.

204438.text: What is inside the chest over there?

204440.text: Collecting mirror shards is your trial, and only by completing the trial can you inherit the power of the Chronospace Protector.

204441.text: Well, I look forward to your return.

204443.text: Inherit the power of the Chronospace Protector?

204444.text: Silver-haired human, only you can inherit this great power.

204445.text: This place has been plunged into chaos like the world you lived in before and only by inheriting the power of the Chronospace Protector can the world be restored to peace.

204446.text: Master, it seems that you have managed to guess the root cause of the chaos in this world.

204448.text: Yes, defeat her to gain her strength and use her power to reshape the world.

204449.text: A consolation gift for after training?

204450.text: Is that a chest over there?

204452.text: Is that a gift for me in the chest?

204453.text: The concentration of magic is surprisingly high as well. The people here will... No, I must not let anyone here get hurt...

204455.text: A chevalier without magic, huh? What are you doing here?

204456.text: Flare, I know this is your hometown, so I thought I might be able to meet you here...

204457.text: So you hid and spied on me?

204458.text: No, I didn't... I just wanted to ask about Protector Asherah.

204460.text: Yes, as you know, this land has suffered from Magical Abnormality. Only Protector Asherah can save this land, but why won't he see me...

204461.text: Apparently the Protector isn't interested in talking to people like you, and neither am I.

204462.text: But we used to talk about everything! Back then, I swore to guard Asherah with you, escorting her on her rounds and receiving her people...

204463.text: It's all in the past, do you really think you can talk with the Protector with you like this?!

204465.text: Be clear about your own place here, the Protector won't see a chevalier who can't do magic like you!

204466.text: Flare, why did you stop me from visiting Lady Asherah? This land has suffered from Magical Abnormality. Only Protector Asherah can save this land, but why she turns her back on us.

204467.text: Phrygia, you are just a chevalier incapable of performing magic. How could Protector have time to see you?

204468.text: Don't stand in my way, Flare. To save Irminsul, I have to ask Lady Asherah personally. You'd better leave now. I don't want to mess with you.

204469.text: You! You are unworthy of the glory granted by the Protector. Since you have forsaken your oath, I'll only punish you for the Protector.

204470.text: Humph, a chevalier who knows nothing of magic, how can I expect you to understand what the Protector is working for. But Phrygia, don't you dare to forget your oath!

204471.text: Though you beat me, the Protector still won't see you! Phrygia, hold to your oath!

204472.text: I swore by my sword to protect my beloved world and now it's my time to live up to that oath. I have made up my mind.

204473.text: Flare, I shall never give up. Since I swore an oath to protect the world in the name of a chevalier, I shall keep my oath and end the disorder in this world.
